GSP27motik_2u:1: [dvau huḍāv iva yudhyete puruṣārthau samāsamau / ātmīyaś cānyadīyaś ca jaya]ty atibalas tayoḥ //MU_2,5.5//
GSP27motik_2u:2: samāsamau arthānarthotpādakatvāt samaviṣamau / ātmīyaḥ ucchāstraḥ / anyadīyaḥ śāstroktaḥ iti / dvau puruṣārthau huḍāv iva yudhyete yuddhaṃ kurutaḥ / tatrāpi samaḥ śāstroktaḥ / asamaḥ ucchāstra iti vibhāgaḥ / tatra tayoḥ dvayoḥ puruṣārthayoḥ madhye / atibalo jayati / huḍaḥ śṛṅgasahito mṛgaviśeṣaḥ //MT_2,5.5//
GSP27motik_2u:4: anarthaḥ prāpyate yatra śāstritād api pauruṣāt / anarthakaṃ tu balavat tatra jñeyaṃ svapauruṣam //MU_2,5.6//
GSP27motik_2u:5: yatra puruṣeṇa śāstritād api pauruṣāt anarthaḥ prāpyate tatra anarthakam anarthotpādakaṃ svapauruṣam aśāstrīyaṃ pauruṣaṃ / balavaj jñeyam / tanmadhye praviṣṭād balavataḥ svapauruṣād evāsau anartha utpanna iti jñeyam iti bhāvaḥ / arthāt tu yatra anarthaḥ na prāpyate tatra śāstrīyam eva balavaj jñeyam / dvayoḥ pauruṣayoś ca sarvatra sandhir asti asahāyasyaikakasyotthānāsaṃbhavāt //MT_2,5.6//
GSP27motik_2u:7: paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya dantair dantān vicūrṇayan / śubhenāśubham udyuktaḥ prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ jayet //MU_2,5.7//
GSP27motik_2u:8: paraṃ pauruṣam śāstroktaṃ pauruṣam / udyuktaḥ udyogayuktaḥ / prāktanaṃ pauruṣam vāsanākhyam prāktanam / api śubhaṃ śubhakāry eva / yataḥ śubhā vāsanaiva mokṣadāyinī proktety aśubham ity uktam //MT_2,5.7//
GSP27motik_2u:9: prāktanaḥ puruṣārtho 'sau māṃ niyojayatīti dhīḥ / balād adhaspadīkāryā pratyakṣād adhikā na sā //MU_2,5.8//
GSP27motik_2u:10: pratyakṣeṇa tu pauruṣasyaiva niyojane sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭam ity etad abhipretya pratyakṣād adhikā na sety uktam //MT_2,5.8//
GSP27motik_2u:11: tāvat tāvat prayatnena yatitavyaṃ svapauruṣaṃ / prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ yāvad aśubhaṃ śāmyati svayam //MU_2,5.9//
GSP27motik_2u:12: svapauruṣaṃ yatitavyam śāstrānusāreṇa svaviṣayaṃ prati yatnayuktaṃ kāryaṃ / yatitavyam iti ṇicyuktaḥ prayogaḥ //MT_2,5.9//
GSP27motik_2u:13: doṣaḥ śāmyaty asandehaṃ prāktano 'dyatanair guṇaiḥ / dṛṣṭānto 'tra hyastanasya doṣasyādyaguṇaiḥ kṣayaḥ //MU_2,5.10//
GSP27motik_2u:15: asaddaivam adhaḥ kṛtvā nityam udyuktayā dhiyā / saṃsārottaraṇaṃ bhūtyai yatetādhātum ātmani //MU_2,5.11//
GSP27motik_2u:17: na gantavyam anudyogaiḥ sāmyaṃ puruṣagardabhaiḥ / udyogas tu yathāśāstraṃ lokadvitayasiddhaye //MU_2,5.12//
GSP27motik_2u:19: saṃsārakuharād asmān nirgantavyaṃ svayaṃ balāt / pauruṣaṃ yatnam āśritya hariṇevāripañjarāt //MU_2,5.13//
GSP27motik_2u:20: saṃsārakuharāt saṃsāraśvabhrāt / hariṇā siṃhena / aripañjarāt aribhūtāt pañjarāt //MT_2,5.13//
GSP27motik_2u:21: pratyahaṃ pratyavekṣeta naraś caritam ātmanaḥ / saṃtyajet paśubhis tulyaṃ śrayet satpuruṣocitam //MU_2,5.14//
GSP27motik_2u:23: kiṃcitkāntānnapānādikalilaṃ komalaṃ gṛhe / vraṇe kīṭa ivāsvādya vayaḥ kāryaṃ na bhasmasāt //MU_2,5.15//
GSP27motik_2u:24: kalilaṃ pāpajanakam / komalaṃ āmukhe komalatayā pratibhāsamānam / vraṇe randhre //MT_2,5.15//
GSP27motik_2u:25: śubhena pauruṣeṇāśu śubham āsādyate phalam / aśubhenāśubhaṃ nityaṃ daivaṃ nāma na kiṃcana //MU_2,5.16//
GSP27motik_2u:27: pratyakṣadṛṣṭam utsṛjya yo 'numānamanās tv asau / svabhujābhyām imau sarpāv iti prekṣya palāyatām //MU_2,5.17//
GSP27motik_2u:29: daivaṃ saṃprerayati mām iti mugdhadhiyāṃ mukham / adṛṣṭaśreṣṭhadṛṣṭīnāṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmīr nivartate //MU_2,5.18//
GSP27motik_2u:30: adṛṣṭā / śreṣṭhā uttamā / dṛṣṭiḥ pauruṣākhyā dṛṣṭiḥ / yaiḥ teṣām //MT_2,5.18//
GSP27motik_2u:31: tasmāt puruṣayatnena vivekaṃ pūrṇam āśrayet / ātmajñānamahārthāni śāstrāṇi pravicārayet //MU_2,5.19//
GSP27motik_2u:32: ātmajñānam eva mahān arthaḥ yeṣāṃ tāni //MT_2,5.19//
GSP27motik_2u:33: citte cintayatām arthaṃ yathāśāstraṃ nijehitaiḥ / asaṃsādhayatām eva mūḍhānāṃ dhig durīpsitam //MU_2,5.20//
GSP27motik_2u:35: pauruṣaṃ ca na cānantaṃ na yatnam abhivāñchate / na yatnenāpi mahatā tailam āsādyate 'śmanaḥ //MU_2,5.21//
GSP27motik_2u:36: pauruṣam anantaṃ antarahitaṃ / na ca bhavati / kiṃ tu niyatam eva bhavati / pauruṣaṃ kartṛ / yatnam na abhivāñchate na svotpādakatvena kāṅkṣate / yatnena svasya niyamaṃ na laṅghayati iti yāvat / puruṣo mahatāpi yatnena svasmin niyataṃ pauruṣaṃ na laṅghayituṃ śaknotīti bhāvaḥ / etad dṛṣṭāntena sugamaṃ karoti / na yatneneti //MT_2,5.21//
GSP27motik_2u:38: yathā ghaṭaḥ parimito yathā parimitaḥ paṭaḥ / niyataḥ parimāṇasthaḥ puruṣārthas tathaiva vaḥ //MU_2,5.22//
GSP27motik_2u:39: ataḥ svapauruṣāviṣaye ākāśagamanādau na yatitavyam iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,5.22//
GSP27motik_2u:40: sa ca śāstrārthasatsaṅgasamācārair nijaṃ phalam / dadātīti svabhāvo 'yam anyathānarthasiddhaye //MU_2,5.23//
GSP27motik_2u:42: svarūpaṃ pauruṣasyaitad daivaṃ vyavaharan naraḥ / yāti niṣphalayatnatvaṃ na kadācana kaścana //MU_2,5.24//
GSP27motik_2u:43: pauruṣasya svarūpam daivam vyavaharan daivam iti nāmnā vyavaharan / na tu paramārthato daivam iti jānann iti yāvat //MT_2,5.24//
GSP27motik_2u:44: dainyadāridryaduḥkhārtā apy anye puruṣottamāḥ / pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena yātā devendratulyatām //MU_2,5.25//
GSP27motik_2u:46: ā bālyāc caivam abhyastaiḥ śāstrasatsaṅgamādibhiḥ / guṇaiḥ puruṣayatnena svo 'rthaḥ saṃprāpyate hi taiḥ //MU_2,5.26//
GSP27motik_2u:47: svo 'rthaḥ mokṣākhyaḥ kāṅkṣito 'rthaḥ / puruṣeṇeti śeṣaḥ / hiśabdaḥ niścaye / taiḥ prasiddhaiḥ guṇair iti karaṇe tṛtīyā / yatneneti tu hetau //MT_2,5.26//
GSP27motik_2u:49: iti pwratyakṣato dṛṣṭam anubhūtaṃ kṛtaṃ śrutam / daivottham iti manyante ye hatās te kubuddhayaḥ //MU_2,5.27//
GSP27motik_2u:50: kṛtam śrutam anuṣṭhitam / sarvam daivāt uttham asti / iti ye manyante / te kubuddhayaḥ hatāḥ naṣṭāḥ //MT_2,5.27//
GSP27motik_2u:51: ālasyaṃ yadi na bhavej jagaty anarthaḥ ko na syād bahudhaniko bahuśruto vā / ālasyād iyam avaniḥ sasāgarāntā saṃpūrṇā narapaśubhiś ca nirdhanaiś ca //MU_2,5.28//
GSP27motik_2u:52: narapaśubhiḥ ajñānibhiḥ / nirdhanaiḥ daridraiḥ / tasmād dhanakāṅkṣibhiḥ mokṣakāṅkṣibhir vā pauruṣam eva kāryam iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,5.28//
GSP27motik_2u:54: bālye gate 'viratakalpitakelilole paugaṇḍamaṇḍanavayaḥprabhṛti prayatnāt / satsaṅgamaiḥ padapadārthavibuddhabuddhiḥ kuryān naraḥ svaguṇadoṣavicāraṇāni //MU_2,5.29//
GSP27motik_2u:55: avirataṃ kalpitā yā keliḥ / tayā lole bālye / bālabhāve gate sati / puruṣaḥ paugaṇḍasyāvasthāviśeṣasya maṇḍanabhūtaṃ yat vayaḥ / tataḥ prabhṛti yauvanāt prabhṛti iti yāvat / prayatnāt yatnena / svaguṇadoṣavicāraṇāni kuryāt / kaiḥ kṛtvā / satsaṅgamaiḥ sādhusaṅgamaiḥ / satsaṅgamābhāve hi svaguṇadoṣavicāraṇam aśakyakriyam eva / puruṣaḥ kathaṃbhūtaḥ / padapadārthavibuddhabuddhiḥ / padapadārthayoḥ vibuddhā buddhiḥ yasya / tādṛśaḥ / padapadārthajña ity arthaḥ //MT_2,5.29//
GSP27motik_2u:56: śrīvālmīkiḥ sargāntaślokena bharadvājaṃ prati tatratyaṃ dināvasānaṃ kathayati
GSP27motik_2u:57: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma / snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma //MU_2,5.30//
GSP27motik_2u:58: munau vasiṣṭhe / iti evam / uktavati sati / divasaḥ jagāma avasānaṃ gataḥ / yataḥ inaḥ sūryaḥ / astaṃ jagāma / sabhā dāśarathī sabhā / kṛtanamaskaraṇā kṛtamuninamaskārā satī / sāyantanāya vidhaye sāyaṃ sandhyārthaṃ / snātuṃ jagāma / sā sabhā śyāmākṣaye rātrikṣaye / ravikaraiḥ sūryakaraiḥ / saha ājagāma ca / iti śivam //MT_2,5.30//
GSP27motik_2u:59: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe pañcamaḥ sargaḥ // 2,5 //
GSP27motik_2u:60: prabhāte śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ śrīrāmaṃ prati pūrvasargoktavastuphalitaṃ kathayati
GSP27motik_2u:61: tasmāt prākpauruṣaṃ daivaṃ nānyat tat projjhya dūrataḥ / sādhusaṅgamasacchāstrair jīvam uttārayed balāt //MU_2,6.1//
GSP27motik_2u:62: tasmāt pūrvasargoktāt hetoḥ / prākpauruṣaṃ prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ / daivam bhavati / anyat pauruṣād bhinnaṃ kiṃcid daivam / na bhavati / ataḥ puruṣaḥ tat daivaṃ / dūrataḥ projjhya arthāt adyatanaṃ śubhaṃ pauruṣam āśritya / sādhusaṅgamasacchāstraiḥ hetubhūtaiḥ / jīvam balāt haṭhena / uttārayet / saṃsārād iti śeṣaḥ //MT_2,6.1//
GSP27motik_2u:63: yathā yathā prayatnaḥ syād bhaved āśu phalaṃ tathā / iti pauruṣam evāsti daivam astu tad eva vaḥ //MU_2,6.2//
GSP27motik_2u:64: prayatnaḥ pauruṣam / tat yuṣmābhiḥ aṅgīkṛtaṃ daivam / vaḥ eva yuṣmākam evāstu //MT_2,6.2//
GSP27motik_2u:65: duḥkhād yathā duḥkhakāle hā kaṣṭam iti kathyate / hākaṣṭaśabdaparyāyas tathā hā daivam ity api //MU_2,6.3//
GSP27motik_2u:66: tathā hā kaṣṭam itivat hā daivam iti dīnānām evoktir astīti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,6.3//
GSP27motik_2u:67: prāksvakarmetarākāraṃ daivaṃ nāma na vidyate / bālaḥ prabalapuṃseva taj jetum iva śakyate //MU_2,6.4//
GSP27motik_2u:68: prāksvakarmaṇaḥ prāktanasvakarmaṇaḥ / itarākāram daivaṃ nāma na vidyate / prāktanāt svakarmaṇaḥ pṛthaksattāṃ na bhajate ity arthaḥ / ataḥ puṃsā tat daivaṃ / jetuṃ śakyate keneva / prabalapuṃsā iva / yathā tena bālo jetuṃ śakyate tathety arthaḥ //MT_2,6.4//
GSP27motik_2u:69: hyastano duṣṭa ācāra ācāreṇādya cāruṇā / yathāśu śubhatāṃ yāti prāktanaṃ kukṛtaṃ tathā //MU_2,6.5//
GSP27motik_2u:70: adyācāreṇa adya kṛtenācāreṇa / tathā tadvat / prāktanaṃ kukṛtam adyatanena sukṛtena śubhatāṃ yāti //MT_2,6.5//
GSP27motik_2u:71: tajjayāya yatante ye na lābhalavalampaṭāḥ / te mūḍhāḥ prākṛtā dīnāḥ sthitā daivaparāyaṇāḥ //MU_2,6.6//
GSP27motik_2u:72: tajjayāya kuvāsanārūpaprāktanāśubhapauruṣajayāya / lābhalave sāṃsārikapadārthāptirūpe lābhaleśe / laṃpaṭāh lobhayuktāḥ / prākṛtāḥ nīcāḥ //MT_2,6.6//
GSP27motik_2u:73: pauruṣeṇa kṛtaṃ karma daivād yad abhinaśyati / tatra nāśayitur jñeyaṃ pauruṣaṃ balavattaram //MU_2,6.7//
GSP27motik_2u:75: yad ekavṛntaphalayor apy ekaṃ śūnyakoṭaram / tatra prayatnaḥ sphuritas tathā tadrasasaṃvidaḥ //MU_2,6.8//
GSP27motik_2u:76: ekasmin vṛnte sthitau phalau ekavṛntaphalau / tayoḥ api madhyāt ekaphalaṃ śūnyakoṭaram sārarahitamadhyaṃ yat bhavati / arthāt dvitīyaṃ sārabharitamadhyaṃ jñeyam / tatra tasmin sthāne / tadrasasaṃvidaḥ tayoḥ phalayoḥ yā rasarūpā saṃvit / tasyāḥ tadrasasyeti yāvat / tathā tena prakāreṇa / yatnaḥ pauruṣaṃ sphuritaḥ / raseneva tādṛśaṃ pauruṣaṃ kṛtaṃ yenaikaṃ phalaṃ sārarahitaṃ saṃpannaṃ / na tv anyaśaṅkitasya daivasyātra kāpi śaktir astīti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,6.8//
GSP27motik_2u:77: yat prayānti jagadbhāvāḥ saṃsiddhā api saṃkṣayam / kṣayakārakayatnasya tatra jñeyaṃ mahad balam //MU_2,6.9//
GSP27motik_2u:78: kṣayakārakasya nāśakartuḥ kālasya / yaḥ yatnaḥ pauruṣam / tasya //MT_2,6.9//
GSP27motik_2u:79: bhikṣuko maṅgalebhena nṛpo yat kriyate balāt / tad amātyebhapaurāṇāṃ prayatnasya mahat phalam //MU_2,6.10//
GSP27motik_2u:80: maṅgalebhena maṅgalahastinā / bhikṣukaḥ nṛpaḥ rājā / balāt yat kriyate amātyebhapaurāṇāṃ rājyapradātṝṇāṃ mantrimaṅgalahastināgarāṇāṃ / prayatnasya tadrājyadānarūpasya pauruṣasya sahaphalaṃ bhavati / na daivasya //MT_2,6.10//
GSP27motik_2u:81: pauruṣenānnam ākramya yathā dantair vicūrṇyate / alpaṃ pauruṣam ākramya tathā śūreṇa cūrṇyate //MU_2,6.11//
GSP27motik_2u:82: yathā dantaiḥ pauruṣeṇa annam ākramya svavaśīkṛtya / cūrṇyate / tathā śūreṇādyatanapauruṣayuktena puruṣeṇa / alpaṃ prāktanatvena jīrṇaprāyaṃ / pauruṣaṃ ākramya cūrṇyate //MT_2,6.11//
GSP27motik_2u:83: anubhūtaṃ hi mahatāṃ lāghavaṃ yatnaśālināṃ / yatheṣṭaṃ viniyujyante te taiḥ karmasu loṣṭavat //MU_2,6.12//
GSP27motik_2u:84: hi yasmāt / asmābhiḥ yatnaśālināṃ pauruṣaśālināṃ / mahatāṃ lāghavaṃ cāturyam / anubhūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭam / kathaṃ anubhūtam ity / atrāha / yatheṣṭam iti / yataḥ taiḥ yatnaśālibhiḥ / te arthāt pauruṣarahitāḥ puruṣāḥ / yatheṣṭaṃ svecchānusāreṇa / loṣṭavat karmasu viniyujyante //MT_2,6.12//
GSP27motik_2u:85: śaktasya pauruṣaṃ dṛśyam adṛśyaṃ vāpi yad bhavet / tad daivam ity aśaktena buddham ātmany abuddhinā //MU_2,6.13//
GSP27motik_2u:86: śaktasya mahatā pauruṣeṇa yuktasya / dṛśyasya puruṣāder adṛśyasya kālādeś ca / dṛśyam adṛśyaṃ vā yat pauruṣaṃ bhavet / abuddhinā samyagjñānarahitena / aśaktena tadapekṣayā śaktirahitena puruṣeṇa / tat śaktasya pauruṣam / ātmani svasmin viṣaye / daivaṃ buddham jñātam / anyathā daivena me kṛtam iti na brūyāt //MT_2,6.13//
GSP27motik_2u:87: bhūtānāṃ balavadbhūtayatno daivam iti sthitam / tasthuṣām apy adhiṣṭhātṛvatām etat sphuṭaṃ mithaḥ //MU_2,6.14//
GSP27motik_2u:88: balavadbhūtayatnaḥ / bhūtānām kṣudrabhūtānāṃ upari / daivam iti sthitam bhavati / puruṣo hi yatra na paryāpto bhavati tatraiva daivena me kṛtam iti kathayati / na kevalam etan mayaiva jñātaṃ kiṃtv anyair apīty āha / tasthuṣām iti / apiśabdaḥ samuccaye / mithaḥ anyo'nyam / adhiṣṭhātṛvatāṃ tasthuṣām prerakayuktānāṃ sthitānām puruṣāṇām api / etat mayā uktaḥ arthaḥ / sphuṭaṃ prakaṭo bhavati / te hi parasparaṃ kṣudrataratamādibhedenādhiṣṭheyāḥ bhavanti / utkṛṣṭataratamādibhedena tv adhiṣṭhātāraḥ / adhiṣṭhātā eva cādhiṣṭheyaṃ prati daivam / ataḥ eteṣu madukto 'rthaḥ sphuṭa eva bhavati iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,6.14//
GSP27motik_2u:90: śāstramātyebhapaurāṇām avikalpyā svabhāvadhīḥ / sā yā bhikṣukarājyasya kartrī dhartrī prajāsthiteḥ //MU_2,6.15//
GSP27motik_2u:91: śāstā purohitaḥ / sa ca amātyaś ca / ibhaś ca maṅgalahastī ca / paurāś ca / teṣām / sā svabhāvadhīḥ svabhāvāt utthitā bhikṣurājyadānarūpā buddhiḥ / avikalpyā nāśayitum aśakyāśaktā iti yāvat bhavati / sā kā / yā bhikṣukarājyasya kartrī bhavati / taddvāreṇa prajāsthiteḥ dhartrī ca bhavati / ato 'trāpy ayam eva nyāya iti bhāvaḥ / iyaṃ hi rītiḥ / yatra deśe rājā mriyate / tasya putraś ca na syāt / tatra maṅgalahastī yaṃ namati / tam eva rājānaṃ kurvantīti //MT_2,6.15//
GSP27motik_2u:92: aihikaḥ prāktanaṃ hanti prāktano 'dyatanaṃ balāt / sarvadā puruṣaspandas tatrānudvegavāñ jayī //MU_2,6.16//
GSP27motik_2u:93: puruṣaspandaḥ pauruṣam / tatra dvayoḥ pauruṣayoḥ madhye / anudvegavān udvegarahitaḥ / lakṣaṇayā atibala ity arthaḥ //MT_2,6.16//
GSP27motik_2u:94: nanu tatra kaḥ prāyaḥ balavān astīty / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:95: dvayor adyatanasyaiva pratyakṣād balitā bhavet / daivaṃ jetum ato yatnair bālo yūneva śakyate //MU_2,6.17//

GSP27motik_2u:201: anantaṃ samatānandaṃ paramārthaṃ svakaṃ viduḥ / tad yebhyaḥ prāpyate yatnāt sevyās te śāstrasādhavaḥ //MU_2,7.28//
GSP27motik_2u:203: sacchāstrādiguṇo matyā sacchāstrādiguṇān matiḥ / vardhete te mitho 'bhyāsāt sarobdāv iva kālataḥ //MU_2,7.29//
GSP27motik_2u:204: sacchāstrādirūpaḥ guṇaḥ matyā bhavati / buddhirahitasya sacchāstrādau pravṛttyabhāvāt / matiḥ sacchāstrādiguṇāt bhavati / te sacchāstrādiguṇamatī / mithaḥ anyonyaṃ / abhyāsāt vardhete vṛddhiṃ gacchataḥ / kāv iva / sarobdāv iva / yathā sarobdau saromeghau / kālataḥ mithaḥ vardhete tathety arthaḥ / kadācid dhi saraḥ meghavṛṣṭena jalena vardhate / kadācit tu meghaḥ sarasaḥ gṛhītena jaleneti //MT_2,7.29//
GSP27motik_2u:205: ābālyād alam abhyastaiḥ śāstrasatsaṃgamādibhiḥ / guṇaiḥ puruṣayatnena svo 'rthaḥ saṃprāpyate hitaḥ //MU_2,7.30//
GSP27motik_2u:206: puruṣayatnena pauruṣeṇābhyastaiḥ anuśīlitaiḥ / svaḥ arthaḥ mokṣākhyaṃ nijaṃ prayojanam //MT_2,7.30//
GSP27motik_2u:207: pauruṣeṇa jitā daityāḥ sthāpitā bhuvanakriyāḥ / racitāni jagantīha viṣṇunā na tu daivataḥ //MU_2,7.31//
GSP27motik_2u:210: jagati puruṣakārakāraṇe 'smin kuru raghunātha ciraṃ tathā prayatnam / vrajasi tarusarīsṛpābhidhānāṃ subhaga yathā na daśām aśaṅkam eva //MU_2,7.32//
GSP27motik_2u:211: jagati kathaṃbhūte / puruṣakāraḥ pauruṣaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasya / tādṛśe / cinmātrapauruṣād eva hi jagad utpannam / prayatnam pauruṣam / tarusarīsṛpābhidhānāṃ daśāṃ tarvādirūpatām ity arthaḥ / tarvādayo hi pauruṣarāhityenaiva duḥkham anubhavantīti teṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ kṛtam / iti śivam //MT_2,7.32//
GSP27motik_2u:212: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuvyavahāraprakaraṇe saptamaḥ sargaḥ // 2,7 //
GSP27motik_2u:214: nākṛtir na ca karmāṇi nāspadaṃ na parākramaḥ / tan mithyājñānavat prauḍhaṃ daivaṃ nāma kim ucyate //MU_2,8.1//
GSP27motik_2u:216: svakarmaphalasaṃprāptāv idam ittham itīha yāḥ / giras tā daivanāmnaitāḥ prasiddhiṃ samupāgatāḥ //MU_2,8.2//
GSP27motik_2u:217: idam ittham iti gira idaṃ itthaṃ saṃpannam iti vācaḥ //MT_2,8.2//
GSP27motik_2u:218: tathaiva mūḍhamatibhir daivam astīti niścayaḥ / ātto duravabodhena rajjāv iva bhujaṅgamaḥ //MU_2,8.3//
GSP27motik_2u:219: ātto gṛhītaḥ / duravabodhena ajñānena / ivaśabdaḥ yathāśābdārthe //MT_2,8.3//
GSP27motik_2u:220: hyastanī duṣkriyābhyeti śobhāṃ satkriyayā yathā / adyaivaṃ prāktanī tasmād yatnāt satkāryavān bhava //MU_2,8.4//
GSP27motik_2u:222: mūḍhānumānasaṃsiddhaṃ daivaṃ yasyāsti durmateḥ / daivād dāho 'stu mā veti vaktavyaṃ tena pāvake //MU_2,8.5//
GSP27motik_2u:223: mūḍhānumānasaṃsiddhaṃ daivaṃ yasya durmateḥ ajñāninaḥ / asti paramārthasad asti / tena durmatinā / pāvake agnau sthitvā / daivād dāhaḥ astu māstu veti vaktavyam / tatra tv asau naitad vaktuṃ śaknoti dāhaikalabdher iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,8.5//
GSP27motik_2u:224: daivam eveha cet karma puṃsaḥ kim iva ceṣṭayā / snānadānāśanādārān daivam eva kariṣyati //MU_2,8.6//
GSP27motik_2u:225: karma karmasaṃpādakam ity arthaḥ / na caitat saṃbhavati akiṃcitkurvataḥ snānādyanupapatter iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,8.6//
GSP27motik_2u:226: kiṃ vā śāstropadeśena mūko 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ kila / saṃcāryate tu daivena kiṃ kasyehopadiśyate //MU_2,8.7//
GSP27motik_2u:227: saṃcāryate saṃcaraṇaśīlaḥ saṃpādyate / kim iti / kena iti śeṣaḥ / daivāṅgīkāre na ko 'pi kasyāpy upadeśaṃ kuryād iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,8.7//
GSP27motik_2u:228: na ca niḥspandatā loke dṛṣṭeha śavatāṃ vinā / spandaś ca phalasaṃprāptis tasmād daivaṃ nirarthakam //MU_2,8.8//
GSP27motik_2u:230: nanu daivena sahaiva puruṣaḥ kāryaṃ karotīty / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:232: hastādīn īhataś caiva na daivena kvacit kṛtam //MT_2,8.9//
GSP27motik_2u:233: amūrtena mūrtirahitena daivena / hastādīn īhataḥ ceṣṭataḥ / mūrtasya puruṣasya / sahakartṛtā ca na bhavati / ataḥ daivena kṛtam daivakartṛkaṃ kāryaṃ / kvacit na bhavati //MT_2,8.9//
GSP27motik_2u:234: nanu manobuddhyādivad amūrtasyāpi daivasya mūrtena saha kartṛtvam asty evety / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:235: manobuddhivad apy etad daivaṃ nehānubhūyate / āgopālaṃ kila prājñais tena daivam asat sadā //MU_2,8.10//
GSP27motik_2u:236: mṛtaśarīre kartṛtvādarśanān manobuddhī kalpyete / na ca daivasyātra kaścid upayoga iti / na tatkalpanāvasara iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,8.10//
GSP27motik_2u:237: nanu kadācit tasmād eva dṛśyāt śarīrādeḥ kāryaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kadācin na dṛṣṭam iti adṛṣṭasya daivasya kalpanā yuktaivety / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:238: pṛthak ced buddhir anyo 'rthaḥ saiva cet kānyatā tayoḥ / kalpanā vā pramāṇaṃ cet pauruṣaṃ kiṃ na kalpyate //MU_2,8.11//
GSP27motik_2u:239: buddhiḥ jñānaṃ / pṛthak cet yady asti / tadārthaḥ anya ekasmāt dvitīyaḥ pṛthag iti yāvat / asti buddhiḥ sā eva / na tu bhinnā ced bhavati / tadā tayoḥ arthayoḥ kā anyatā bhavati / ato 'tra kevalasaddṛśyāc charīrāder eva kāryaṃ bhavatv iti bhāvaḥ / nanv atra buddhipṛthaktvopayogo nāsti / kalpanāyā eva pramāṇatvād ity / atrāha / kalpaneti / kalpanā prathamaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāsti ced / vāsti / tadā pauruṣaṃ kiṃ na kalpyate / kalpanayā saṃbhāvyate samānanyāyatvāt //MT_2,8.11//
GSP27motik_2u:240: punar api prakṛtaṃ mūrtāmūrtayoḥ sahakartṛtvāsaṃbhavam eva kathayati
GSP27motik_2u:241: nāmūrtena ca saṅgo 'sti nabhaseva vapuṣmataḥ / mūrtaṃ ca dṛśyate lagnaṃ tasmād daivaṃ na vidyate //MU_2,8.12//
GSP27motik_2u:242: vapuṣmataḥ mūrtasya śarīriṇaḥ / amūrtena mūrtirahitena daivena / saṅgaḥ sahakartṛtvaṃ nāsti / keneva / nabhasā iva / nanu tathāpi amūrtam eva kartṛ bhavatv ity / atrāha / mūrtaṃ ceti / asmābhiḥ mūrtam eva lagnaṃ kāryalagnaṃ dṛśyate / ataḥ tasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ / phalitaṃ kathayati / tasmād iti / tasmāt tato hetoḥ / daivaṃ na vidyate / tatkalpanāyāḥ nirastatvāt //MT_2,8.12//
GSP27motik_2u:243: viniyoktātha bhūtānām asty anyat tajjagattraye / śeratāṃ bhūtavṛndāni daivaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyati //MU_2,8.13//
GSP27motik_2u:244: viniyoktā prerakaḥ / anyad daivākhyaṃ anyat vastu / śeratām kāryeṣv anudyogaṃ bhajantām //MT_2,8.13//
GSP27motik_2u:245: daivenetthaṃ niyukto 'smi kiṃ karomīdṛśaṃ sthitam / samāśvāsanavāg eṣā na daivaṃ paramārthataḥ //MU_2,8.14//
GSP27motik_2u:247: mūḍhaiḥ prakalpitaṃ daivaṃ tatparās te kṣayaṃ gatāḥ / prājñās tu puruṣārthena padam uttamam āgatāḥ //MU_2,8.15//
GSP27motik_2u:248: tatparāḥ svayaṃkalpitadaivaparāḥ / te mūḍhāḥ / puruṣārthena pauruṣeṇa / uttamaṃ padam mokṣākhyam utkṛṣṭaṃ sthānam //MT_2,8.15//
GSP27motik_2u:249: ye śūrā ye ca vikrāntā ye prājñā ye ca paṇḍitāḥ / tais taiḥ kair iva loke 'smin vada daivaṃ pracakṣyate //MU_2,8.16//
GSP27motik_2u:250: pracakṣyate kathyate / na kenāpi pracakṣyate iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,8.16//
GSP27motik_2u:251: kālavidbhir vinirṇītā yasyāsti cirajīvitā / sa cej jīvati saṃchinnaśirās tad daivam uttamam //MU_2,8.17//
GSP27motik_2u:253: kālavidbhir vinirṇītaṃ pāṇḍityaṃ yasya rāghava / anadhyāpita evāsau tajjñaś ced daivam uttamam //MU_2,8.18//
GSP27motik_2u:255: viśvāmitreṇa muninā daivam utsṛjya dūrataḥ / pauruṣeṇaiva saṃprāptaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ rāma nānyathā //MU_2,8.19//
GSP27motik_2u:257: amībhir na parai rāma puruṣair munitāṃ gataiḥ / pauruṣeṇaiva saṃprāptā ciraṃ gaganagamitā //MU_2,8.20//
GSP27motik_2u:258: amībhiḥ pauruṣayuktair ebhir eva / paraiḥ pauruṣarahitaiḥ sāmānyajantubhiḥ / gaganagamitā paramākāśacāritvam //MT_2,8.20//
GSP27motik_2u:259: utsādya devasaṃghātāṃś cakrus tribhuvanodare / pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena sāmrājyaṃ dānaveśvarāḥ //MU_2,8.21//
GSP27motik_2u:260: utsādya bādhitvā / devasaṃghātān devasamūhān / dānaveśvarāḥ hiraṇyākṣyādayaḥ //MT_2,8.21//
GSP27motik_2u:261: ālūnaśīrṇam ābhogi jagad ājahrur ojasā / pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena dānavebhyaḥ sureśvarāḥ //MU_2,8.22//
GSP27motik_2u:263: rāma pauruṣayuktyaiva salilaṃ dhāryate na vā / ciraṃ karaṇḍake yuktyā na daivaṃ tatra kāraṇam //MU_2,8.23//
GSP27motik_2u:264: karaṇḍake randhrayukte kāṇḍasādhite dravyaviśeṣe / kenacit prayogena hi karaṇḍe 'pi jalaṃ tiṣṭhati //MT_2,8.23//
GSP27motik_2u:265: haraṇādānasaṃrambhavibhramabhramabhūmiṣu / śaktatā dṛśyate rāma na daivasyauṣadher iva //MU_2,8.24//
GSP27motik_2u:268: sakalakāraṇakāryavivarjitaṃ nijavikalpavaśād upakalpitam / tvam anavekṣya hi daivam asanmayaṃ śraya śubhāśaya pauruṣam uttamam //MU_2,8.25//
GSP27motik_2u:272: bhagavan sarvadharmajña pratiṣṭhām alam āgatam / yal loke tad vada brahman daivam evaṃ kim ucyate //MU_2,9.1//
GSP27motik_2u:273: he bhagavan / brahman vasiṣṭha / kathaṃbhūta / sarvadharmajña / tvam vada / yat daivam loke evam pratiṣṭhām prasiddhim / āgataṃ / tat paṇḍitaiḥ kiṃrūpaṃ kathyate / na hi asiddhaṃ vastu prasiddhim āyāti iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,9.1//
GSP27motik_2u:275: pauruṣaṃ sarvakāryāṇāṃ kartṛ rāghava netarat / phalabhoktṛ ca sarvatra na daivaṃ tatra kāraṇam //MU_2,9.2//
GSP27motik_2u:276: he rāghava / pauruṣaṃ sarvakāryāṇāṃ kartṛ bhavati / itarat anyat daivādi / kartṛ na bhavati / na kevalaṃ kartr eva / kiṃ tu phalabhoktṛ ca bhavati / svāviṣṭapuruṣadvāreṇeti bhāvaḥ / daivaṃ tatra kāraṇaṃ na bhavati / ato daivaṃ nāstīti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,9.2//
GSP27motik_2u:277: daivaṃ na kiṃcit kurute na ca bhuṅkte na vidyate / na dṛśyate nādriyate kevalaṃ kalpanedṛśī //MU_2,9.3//
GSP27motik_2u:278: īdṛśī daivam eva sarvaṃ karotīty evaṃrūpā / na ca kalpanāyāḥ satyatvam iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,9.3//
GSP27motik_2u:279: siddhasya pauruṣeṇeha phalasya phalaśālinām / śubhāśubhā vā saṃpattir daivaśabdena kathyate //MU_2,9.4//
GSP27motik_2u:280: paṇḍitaiḥ phalaśālināṃ phalabhājāṃ / pauruṣeṇa śubhāśubhena pauruṣeṇa / siddhasya phalasya śubhā aśubhā vā saṃpattiḥ daivaśabdena kathyate / ajñavyavahārārtham iti śeṣaḥ //MT_2,9.4//
GSP27motik_2u:281: pauruṣoparatā nityam iṣṭāniṣṭasya vastunaḥ / prāptir iṣṭāpy aniṣṭā vā daivaśabdena kathyate //MU_2,9.5//
GSP27motik_2u:282: paṇḍitaiḥ pauruṣe uparatā niṣṭhāṃ gatā / iṣṭāniṣṭasya vastunaḥ iṣṭā aniṣṭā vā prāptiḥ daivaśabdena kathyate / apiśabdaḥ pādapūraṇārthaḥ //MT_2,9.5//
GSP27motik_2u:283: bhāvī tv avaśyam evārthaḥ puruṣārthaikasādhanaḥ / yaḥ so 'smiṃl lokasaṃghāte daivaśabdena kathyate //MU_2,9.6//
GSP27motik_2u:284: bhāvī bhavanaśīlaḥ / puruṣārthaḥ pauruṣam ekaṃ sādhanaṃ yasya / tādṛśaḥ / lokasaṃghāte lokasamūhe //MT_2,9.6//
GSP27motik_2u:285: na tu rāghava lokasya kasyacit kiṃcid eva hi / daivam ākāśakalpaṃ hi karoti na karoti vā //MU_2,9.7//
GSP27motik_2u:286: hi yasmādarthe / ākāśakalpam ākāśavad atyantatuccham / na hi vandhyāsutaḥ kasyacit kiṃcit karoti na karoti veti bhāvaḥ / dvitīyo hiśabdaḥ niścaye //MT_2,9.7//
GSP27motik_2u:288: idam itthaṃ sthitam iti yoktis tad daivam ucyate //MT_2,9.8//
GSP27motik_2u:289: ukteḥ svarūpaṃ kathayati / idam itthaṃ sthitam itīti / siddham saṃpannam //MT_2,9.8//
GSP27motik_2u:290: itthaṃ mamābhavad buddhir itthaṃ me niścayo hy abhūt / iti karmaphalāvāptau yoktis tad daivam ucyate //MU_2,9.9//
GSP27motik_2u:291: itthaṃ karmaphalasādhanarūpā / karmaphalasyāvāptau prāptau / uktimātram eva daivam iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,9.9//
GSP27motik_2u:292: iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaprāptāv evam ityarthavācakam / āśvāsanāmātravaco daivam ity eva kathyate //MU_2,9.10//
GSP27motik_2u:293: āśvāsanāmātravacaḥ kathaṃbhūtaṃ / evam / iti yaḥ arthaḥ / tasya vācakam niyamavācakam ity arthaḥ //MT_2,9.10//
GSP27motik_2u:294: śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati bhagavan sarvadharmajña prāg yat karmopasaṃcitam / / tad etad daivam ity uktam apamṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ tvayā //MU_2,9.11//
GSP27motik_2u:297: sādhu rāghava jānāsi śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te 'khilam / daivaṃ nāstīti te yena sthirā buddhir bhaviṣyati //MU_2,9.12//
GSP27motik_2u:300: yā magnā vāsanā pūrvaṃ babhūva kila bhūriśaḥ / saiveyaṃ karmabhāvena nṝṇāṃ pariṇatiṃ gatā //MU_2,9.13//
GSP27motik_2u:301: pūrvam pitrantargatabījatāvasthāyām / bhūriśaḥ bhūriprakāreṇa / vartamānā yā vāsanā śubhāśubhā vā bhāvanā / magnā / bīje iti śeṣaḥ bhavati / sā eveyaṃ nṝṇāṃ karmabhāvena karmarūpeṇa / pariṇatiṃ rūpāntaraṃ / gatā / tadanurūpam eva sarve karma kurvantīti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,9.13//
GSP27motik_2u:302: jantur yadvāsano nāma tatkarmā bhavati kṣaṇāt / anyakarmānyabhāvaś cety etan naivopapadyate //MU_2,9.14//
GSP27motik_2u:304: grāmago grāmam āpnoti pattanārthī ca pattanam / yo yo yadvāsanas tat tat sa sa prayatate tathā //MU_2,9.15//
GSP27motik_2u:305: grāmagasya ca grāmagamanavāsanā sphuṭā evānyathā na yāyāt //MT_2,9.15//
GSP27motik_2u:306: yad eva tīvrasaṃvegād iha karma kṛtaṃ purā / tad eva daivaśabdena paryāyeṇa hi kathyate //MU_2,9.16//
GSP27motik_2u:307: iha ihalokaparalokatayā dvirūpe saṃsāre / purā pitrantargatabījatāvasthāyām / karmakaraṇaṃ cātra pitṛdvāreṇaiva jñeyam //MT_2,9.16//
GSP27motik_2u:309: evaṃ daivaṃ svakarmāṇi karma prauḍhā svavāsanā / vāsanā manaso nānyā mano hi puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ //MU_2,9.17//
GSP27motik_2u:310: evam anena prakāreṇa / svakarmāṇi prāk kṛtāni nijakarmāṇi / daivaṃ bhavati / prauḍhā vāsanā karma bhavati / tadanusāreṇaiva tasya prakṛtatvāt / vāsanā manasaḥ anyā na bhavati / hi niścaye / manaḥ puruṣaḥ bhavati / ataḥ daivasya puruṣād vyatiriktā sattā nāstīti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,9.17//
GSP27motik_2u:312: yad daivaṃ tāni karmāṇi karma sādho mano hi tat / mano hi puruṣas tasmād daivaṃ nāstīti niścayaḥ //MU_2,9.18//
GSP27motik_2u:313: karmety atra yacchabdādhyāhāraḥ / yat karma / tat mano bhavati //MT_2,9.18//
GSP27motik_2u:314: ekam eva mano jantor yathā prayatate hi yat / nūnaṃ tat tad avāpnoti svata eva na daivataḥ //MU_2,9.19//
GSP27motik_2u:316: manaś cittaṃ vāsanā ca karma daivaṃ svaniścayaḥ / rāma puṃniścayasyaitāḥ saṃjñāḥ sadbhir udāhṛtāḥ //MU_2,9.20//
GSP27motik_2u:318: evaṃnāmā hi puruṣo dṛḍhabhāvanayā yathā / nityaṃ prayatate rāma phalam āpnoty alaṃ tathā //MU_2,9.21//
GSP27motik_2u:321: evaṃ puruṣakāreṇa sarvam eva raghūdvaha / prāpyate netareṇeha tasmāt sa śubhado 'stu te //MU_2,9.22//
GSP27motik_2u:322: saḥ puruṣakāraḥ / śubhado jīvanmuktākhyaśubhaphalapradaḥ / te ity upalakṣaṇam / tena sarveṣāṃ śubhaphalapradaḥ bhavatu ity arthaḥ //MT_2,9.22//
GSP27motik_2u:324: prāktanaṃ vāsanājālaṃ niyojayati māṃ yathā / mune tathaiva tiṣṭhāmi kṛpaṇaḥ kiṃ karomy aham //MU_2,9.23//
GSP27motik_2u:325: ataḥ pauruṣaṃ kiṃcid api nāstīti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,9.23//
GSP27motik_2u:327: ata eva hi he rāma śreyaḥ prāpnoṣi śāśvatam / svaprayatnopanītena pauruṣeṇaiva nānyathā //MU_2,9.24//
GSP27motik_2u:328: hi niścaye / ata eva pūrvoktāt kāraṇād eva / pauruṣeṇa kathaṃbhūtena / svaprayatnopanītena / rāhoḥ śira itivad ayaṃ prayogaḥ //MT_2,9.24//
GSP27motik_2u:329: dvividho vāsanāvyūhaḥ śubhaś caivāśubhaś ca te / prāktano vidyate rāma dvayor ekataro 'tha vā //MU_2,9.25//
GSP27motik_2u:330: vāsanāvyūhaḥ vāsanāsamūhaḥ / atha vā pakṣāntare / dvayoḥ madhye / ekataraḥ śubhaḥ aśubho vā asti //MT_2,9.25//
GSP27motik_2u:331: vāsanaughena śuddhena tatra ced adya nīyase / tat krameṇa śubhenaiva padaṃ prāpnoṣi śāśvatam //MU_2,9.26//
GSP27motik_2u:332: nīyase svānusāreṇa karma kāryase / padam mokṣākhyaṃ sthānaṃ //MT_2,9.26//
GSP27motik_2u:333: atha ced aśubho bhāvas tvāṃ yojayati saṅkaṭe / prāktanas tad asau yatnāj jetavyo bhavatā balāt //MU_2,9.27//
GSP27motik_2u:334: aśubho bhāvaḥ aśubhā vāsanā / balāt haṭhāt //MT_2,9.27//
GSP27motik_2u:335: nanv anyaḥ cetanārūpaḥ kaścin māṃ prerayati / tat katham ahaṃ svayaṃ kiṃcit kartuṃ śaknomīty / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:336: prājña cetanāmātras tvaṃ na dehas tvaṃ jaḍātmakaḥ / tad eva cetasy anyena cet tat tvaṃ kveva vidyase //MU_2,9.28//
GSP27motik_2u:337: he prājña / asmiñ śloke vakṣyamāṇe upadeśe yogyatvam / cetanāmātraḥ asi tvam / jaḍaḥ dehaḥ nāsi / tad eva cetanāmātram eva san / tvam anyena hetukartṛbhūtena kṛtvā / cet yadi / cetasi citikriyāṃ prati kartṛtvaṃ bhajasi / tat tadā / tvam na vidyase nāsi / tasyaiva sattvāt / na hi dvayoḥ sattā yuktā vyarthatvāt //MT_2,9.28//
GSP27motik_2u:338: punar api pūrvaślokottarārdhaniścitam artham eva kathayati
GSP27motik_2u:339: anyas tvāṃ cetayati cet tat tvayy asati ko 'paraḥ / kam imaṃ cetayet tasmād anavasthā na vāstavī //MU_2,9.29//
GSP27motik_2u:340: anyaḥ tvām cet cetayati citikriyākartṛtvam prerayati / tat tadā / tvayi asati pūrvoktayuktyā sattām abhajati sati / sa iti kam imam kiṃrūpam / idantāspandaṃ tvāṃ / cetayet citikriyākartṛtvaṃ prati prerayet / na hy asataḥ preraṇaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ / ataḥ anyaḥ kaścit preryaḥ kalpanīyaḥ / so 'pi tvatsamānayogakṣema eveti kutrāpi preryatayā viśrāntir na syād / ataḥ tvam eva preryaprerakabhāvena sthito 'sīty abhiprāyeṇopasaṃhāraṃ karoti / tasmād iti / tasmāt tato hetoḥ / anavasthā preryānavasthitiḥ / vāstavī paramārthabhūtā / na bhavati / tavaiva preryaprerakatvābhyāṃ sthitatvāt / ato na kaścit tavānyaḥ prerakaḥ astīti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,9.29//
GSP27motik_2u:342: śubhāśubhābhyāṃ mārgābhyāṃ vahantī vāsanāsarit / pauruṣeṇa prayatnena yojanīyā śubhe pathi //MU_2,9.30//
GSP27motik_2u:343: yojanīyā pravartanīyā / bhogatyāgaparāmarśākhyaṃ śubhānusandhānam eva satataṃ kāryam iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,9.30//
GSP27motik_2u:344: aśubheṣu samāviṣṭaṃ śubheṣv evāvatārayet / svamanaḥ puruṣārthena balena balināṃ vara //MU_2,9.31//
GSP27motik_2u:346: aśubhāc calitaṃ yāti śubhaṃ tasmād apītarat / jantoś cittaṃ tu paśuvat tasmāt tat pālayed balāt //MU_2,9.32//
GSP27motik_2u:347: aśubhāt bhogārjanaparāmarśarūpāt aśubhānusandhānāt / tasmād api śubhād api / pālayed aśubhāt rakṣet //MT_2,9.32//
GSP27motik_2u:348: samatāsāntvanenāśu na drāg iti śanaiḥ śanaiḥ / pauruṣeṇa prayatnena pālayec cittabālakam //MU_2,9.33//
GSP27motik_2u:349: samatā sarvam idaṃ brahmety evaṃrūpā buddhiḥ / tayā yat sāntvanam samāśvāsanaṃ tena / na drāg iti na jhaṭiti / etasyārthaṃ svakaṇṭhena kathayati / śanaiḥ śanair iti samyagvicāreṇa / na tu prāṇarodhanādirūpeṇa haṭhenety arthaḥ //MT_2,9.33//
GSP27motik_2u:350: vāsanaughas tvayā pūrvam abhyāsena ghanīkṛtaḥ / śubho vāpy aśubho rāma śubham adya ghanīkuru //MU_2,9.34//
GSP27motik_2u:352: prāgabhyāsavaśād yātā yadā te vāsanodayam / tadābhyāsasya sāphalyaṃ viddhi tvam arimardana //MU_2,9.35//
GSP27motik_2u:354: idānīm api te yāti ghanatāṃ vāsanānagha / abhyāsavaśatas tasmāc chubhābhyāsam upāhara //MU_2,9.36//
GSP27motik_2u:356: pūrvaṃ ced ghanatāṃ yātā nābhyāsāt tava vāsanā / vardhiṣyate tu nedānīm api tāta sukhī bhava //MU_2,9.37//
GSP27motik_2u:357: vāsanārāhityamātrasyaiva parame pade yatatvāt iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,9.37//
GSP27motik_2u:358: saṃdigdhāyām api bhṛśaṃ śubham eva samāhara / asyāṃ tu vāsanāvṛddhau śubhād doṣo na kaścana //MU_2,9.38//
GSP27motik_2u:359: asyāṃ vāsanāvṛddhau saṃdigdhāyām kim abhyāsād vardhate na veti sandehaviṣayāyām api satyāṃ / tvaṃ bhṛśaṃ śubham eva samāhara abhyāsaviṣayīkuru / yataḥ śubhāt kaścana doṣo na bhavati //MT_2,9.38//
GSP27motik_2u:361: yad yad abhyasyate loke tanmayenaiva bhūyate / ity ākumāraṃ prajñeṣu dṛṣṭaṃ sandehavarjitam //MU_2,9.39//
GSP27motik_2u:363: śubhavāsanayā yuktas tad atra bhava bhūtaye / paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya vijityendriyapañcakam //MU_2,9.40//
GSP27motik_2u:365: avyutpannamanā yāvad bhavān ajñātatatpadaḥ / guruśāstrapramāṇais tu nirṇītaṃ tāvad ācara //MU_2,9.41//
GSP27motik_2u:366: avyutpannamanāḥ jñānarahitaḥ / ata evājñātatatpadaḥ ajñātabrahmākhyotkṛṣṭasthānaḥ / nirṇītam tatpadanirṇayam / bhāve ktaprayoge nirṇītam iti siddham //MT_2,9.41//
GSP27motik_2u:367: tataḥ kaṣāyapākena nūnaṃ vijñātavastunā / śubho 'py asau tvayā tyājyo bhāvanaugho nirādhinā //MU_2,9.42//
GSP27motik_2u:368: kaṣāyapākena lakṣaṇayā parakoṭiprāptyā / bhāvanaughaḥ nirṇayarūpaḥ vāsanāsamūhaḥ / nirādhinā śubhavāsanākhyacittapīḍārahitena //MT_2,9.42//
GSP27motik_2u:370: yad atisubhagam āryasevitaṃ tac chubham anusṛtya manojñabhāvabuddhyā / adhigamaya padaṃ sadāviśokaṃ tad anu tad apy avamucya sādhu tiṣṭha //MU_2,9.43//
GSP27motik_2u:371: tvaṃ / yat atisubhagam ata evāryasevitam bhavati / tac chubhaṃ pauruṣam / manojñabhāvā śubhavāsanā yā matiḥ / tayā karaṇabhūtayā / anusṛtya satatānuṣṭhānaviṣayatāṃ nītvā / aviśokaṃ duḥkharahitaṃ / padaṃ jīvanmuktirūpaṃ sthānaṃ / adhigamaya prāpnuhi / ārṣaḥ svārthe ṇic / tad anu kālāntare / tad api jīvanmuktipadam api avamucya / sādhu samyak / tiṣṭha videhamuktau sthirībhavety arthaḥ / iti śivam //MT_2,9.43//
GSP27motik_2u:372: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe navamaḥ sargaḥ // 2,9 //
GSP27motik_2u:374: ataḥ pauruṣam āśritya śreyase nityabāndhavam / ekāgraṃ kuru cittaṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu coktam idaṃ mama //MU_2,10.1//
GSP27motik_2u:376: avāntarābhipātīni svārūḍhāni manoratham / pauruṣeṇendriyāṇy āśu saṃyamya samatāṃ naya //MU_2,10.2//
GSP27motik_2u:377: avāntareṣu bhogarūpeṣu madhyameṣu viśrāntisthāneṣu / na tu paramātmarūpe parame viśrāntisthāne / abhipātīni patanaśīlāni / manorathaṃ cittānusandhānam / svārūḍhāni suṣṭhu ārūḍhāni / indriyāṇi saṃyamya pratyāhṛtya / samatāṃ rāgadveṣarahitatvam naya / anyathā na śroṣyasīti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,10.2//
GSP27motik_2u:378: ihāmutra ca siddhyarthaṃ puruṣārthaphalapradām / mokṣopāyamayīṃ vakṣye saṃhitāṃ sārasammitām //MU_2,10.3//
GSP27motik_2u:379: mokṣopāyamayīṃ mokṣasya yaḥ upāyaḥ tanmayīm tadvācakām ity arthaḥ / saṃhitām śāstram / sārasammitām sāratulyām //MT_2,10.3//
GSP27motik_2u:380: apunargrahaṇāyāntas tyaktvā saṃsāravāsanām / saṃpūrṇau śamasantoṣāv ādāyodārayā dhiyā //MU_2,10.4//
GSP27motik_2u:381: sapūrvāparavākyārthavicāraviṣayādṛtam / manaḥ samarasaṃ kṛtvā sānusandhānam ātmani //MU_2,10.5//
GSP27motik_2u:382: sukhaduḥkhakṣayakaraṃ mahānandaikasādhanam / mokṣopāyam imaṃ rāma vakṣyamāṇaṃ mayā śṛṇu //MU_2,10.6//
GSP27motik_2u:383: he rāma / tvaṃ mayā vakṣyamāṇaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ śṛṇu / kiṃ kṛtvā / apunargrahaṇāyetyādi / suṣuptau tyaktām api vāsanāṃ puruṣaḥ punaḥ gṛhṇātīti apunargrahaṇāyety uktam / antaḥ manasi / anyathā na śrotuṃ śaknoṣīti bhāvaḥ / ādāya gṛhītvā / manaḥ kathaṃbhūtaṃ / ātmani samarasam ekarasam / na tu viṣayeṣu vikṣiptaṃ / tathā sapūrvāparaḥ saṃpūrṇaḥ yaḥ vākyārthavicāraḥ / sa eva viṣayaḥ saṃcārasthānam / tatrādṛtam //MT_2,10.4-6//
GSP27motik_2u:384: imāṃ mokṣakathāṃ śrutvā saha sarvair vivekibhiḥ / padaṃ yāsyasi nirduḥkhaṃ nāśo yatra na vidyate //MU_2,10.7//
GSP27motik_2u:386: evaṃ śrīrāmasya pauruṣam āśrayaṇīyatvenopadiśya viśvāmitrapreraṇayā smṛtaṃ brahmoktam upadeśaṃ kathayituṃ prastāvaṃ karoti
GSP27motik_2u:387: idam uktaṃ purākalpe brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā / sarvaduḥkhakṣayakaraṃ paramāśvāsanaṃ dhiyaḥ //MU_2,10.8//
GSP27motik_2u:388: idaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ / dhiyaḥ buddheḥ / paramāśvāsanam utkṛṣṭaṃ āśvāsanakāri //MT_2,10.8//
GSP27motik_2u:390: kenoktaṃ kāraṇenedaṃ brahman pūrvaṃ svayaṃbhuvā / kathaṃ ca bhavatā prāptam etat kathaya me prabho //MU_2,10.9//
GSP27motik_2u:393: asty anantavilāsātmā sarvagaḥ sarvasaṃśrayaḥ / cidākāśo 'vināśātmā pradīpaḥ sarvavastuṣu //MU_2,10.10//
GSP27motik_2u:394: cidākāśaḥ cid iti nāmadheyaḥ ākāśaḥ cidākāśaḥ / saḥ asti paramārthasan bhavati / kathaṃbhūtaḥ / anantāḥ aparicchinnāḥ / ye vilāsāḥ sargāvabhāsanasaṃkocanarūpāḥ vilāsāḥ te / ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya saḥ / tathā sarvagaḥ sarvavyāpakatvāt upacāreṇa sarvagantā / na hi mukhyaṃ sarvagatvam asya saṃbhavati niṣkriyatvena gamikriyānāśrayatvāt / punaḥ kathaṃbhūtaḥ / sarveṣām samastānāṃ bhāvābhāvasvarūpāṇāṃ padārthānāṃ / saṃśrayaḥ sphūrtipradatvena sattāpradatvena cāśrayaḥ / punaḥ kathaṃbhūtaḥ / avināśātmā vināśasyāpi sākṣitayā sattāpradatvena ca tena rahitaḥ ātmā yasya saḥ / na hi svasphūrtipradasya svasattāpādakasya ca kaścit āvaraṇaṃ kartuṃ śaktaḥ tadāvṛtau svasyāpy asiddhatvāt / punaḥ kathaṃbhūtaḥ / sarvavastuṣu pradīpaḥ prakāśakatvāt / nanu kutrāsāv astīti cen / na / sarvatra vartamānasya kutreti vaktum aśakyatvāt / nanu tathāpi kathaṃ nāsau sarvatra dṛśyate iti ced / asad etat / draṣṭrekasvarūpe tasmin kathaṃ na dṛśyata ity asyāpi vaktum aśakyatvāt / tathāpi ko 'sāv iti cet / yaḥ pṛcchati sa eveti brūmaḥ / nanu kaḥ pṛcchati iti cet / ahantayā atiprākaṭyena bhāsamānaḥ saḥ svayam eva svāntaḥ vicāryatām ity alaṃ rahasyodghāṭanena //MT_2,10.10//
GSP27motik_2u:396: spandāspandasamākārāt tato viṣṇur ajāyata / spandamānarasāpūrāt taraṅgaḥ sāgarād iva //MU_2,10.11//
GSP27motik_2u:397: spandāspandayoḥ sṛṣṭyāveśaudāsīnyayoḥ samākārāt cittvākhyasamānākārayuktāt / tataḥ tasmāc cidākāśāt / viṣṇuḥ bhāvisṛṣṭisthitikārī nārāyaṇākhyo devatāviśeṣaḥ / samaṣṭirūpaṃ śuddhabuddhitattvaṃ cājāyata / saṃhārakāraṇasya śuddhāhaṅkārarūpasya rudrasya kathanaṃ sṛṣṭimātrakathanākāṅkṣayā na kṛtam / viṣṇuḥ ka iva / taraṅga iva / yathā spandamānarasāpūrāt sāgarāt taraṅgaḥ jāyate tathety arthaḥ //MT_2,10.11//
GSP27motik_2u:398: sumerukarṇikāt tasya digdalād dhṛdayāmbujāt / tārakākesaravataḥ parameṣṭhī vyajāyata //MU_2,10.12//
GSP27motik_2u:399: tasya nārāyaṇasya śuddhabuddhitattvasya ca / sumerukarṇikāt tathā tārakākesarāt hṛdayāmbujāt hṛtkamalāt tadantargatāt brahmāṇḍāt iti yāvat / bhāvisarvajagadādhāratvayogyāt svarūpaleśāc ca / parameṣṭhī bhāvisṛṣṭyutpattikārī brahmākhyo devatāviśeṣaḥ / samaṣṭirūpaṃ śuddhamanastattvaṃ ca vyajāyata //MT_2,10.12//
GSP27motik_2u:400: vedavedārthadeveśamunimaṇḍalamālitam / so 'sṛjat sakalaṃ sargaṃ vikalpaughaṃ yathā manaḥ //MU_2,10.13//
GSP27motik_2u:401: sakalaṃ jagat bāhyatvena bhāsamānaṃ samastaṃ jagat / samaṣṭibhūtaśuddhamanastattvarūpāt / parameṣṭhina eva hi sarvaṃ jagad utpannam / atropamānatvaṃ vyaṣṭirūpasya manasaḥ jñeyam / samaṣṭirūpasya manasaḥ upameyatvāt //MT_2,10.13//
GSP27motik_2u:402: jambudvīpasya koṇe 'smin varṣe bhāratanāmani / sa sasarja janaṃ putrair ādhivyādhipariplutam //MU_2,10.14//
GSP27motik_2u:403: janam mānavajanam / putraiḥ prajāpatibhiḥ kṛtvā sāmānyajanaiś ca //MT_2,10.14//
GSP27motik_2u:405: bhāvābhāvaviṣaṇṇāṅgam utpātadhvaṃsatatparam / sarge 'smin bhūtajātīnām āpyāyanakaraṃ param //MU_2,10.15//
GSP27motik_2u:407: janasya tasya duḥkhaṃ sad dṛṣṭvā sakalalokakṛt / jagāma karuṇām īśaḥ putraduḥkhād yathā pitā //MU_2,10.16//
GSP27motik_2u:408: tasya janasya mānavajanasya / īśaḥ brahmā śuddhamanastattvaṃ ca / karuṇāṃ dayām / atra ca śuddhamanasaḥ karuṇā sṛjyamānasmṛtikāracittāveśadvāreṇa jñeyety alaṃ rahasyodghāṭanena //MT_2,10.16//
GSP27motik_2u:409: nanu tataḥ kim akarod ity / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:410: ka eteṣāṃ hatāśānāṃ duḥkhasyānto hatāyuṣām / syād iti kṣaṇam ekāgraś cintayām āsa bhūtapaḥ //MU_2,10.17//
GSP27motik_2u:411: hatāśānāṃ naṣṭānāṃ / hatāyuṣāṃ naśvarāṇāṃ / antaḥ avasānaṃ //MT_2,10.17//
GSP27motik_2u:413: iti saṃcintya bhagavān sasarja punar īśvaraḥ / tapo dharmaṃ ca dānaṃ ca satyaṃ tīrthāni caiva ha //MU_2,10.18//
GSP27motik_2u:414: sasarja svayaṃ / kṛteṣu smṛtiśāstreṣu janān prati kartavyatvena dṛṣṭavān ity arthaḥ //MT_2,10.18//
GSP27motik_2u:415: etat sṛṣṭvā punar devaś cintayām āsa bhūtakṛt / puṃsāṃ nānena sarvasya duḥkhasyānta iti svayam //MU_2,10.19//
GSP27motik_2u:417: punaḥ kena puṃsāṃ sarvasya duḥkhasyāntaḥ bhaviṣyatīty āśaṅkya cintayati
GSP27motik_2u:418: nirvāṇaṃ nāma paramaṃ sukhaṃ yena punar janaḥ / na jāyate na mriyate taj jñānād eva labhyate //MU_2,10.20//
GSP27motik_2u:419: tan nirvāṇaṃ kena syād ity āśaṅkya cintayati / taj jñānād iti / tat nirvāṇam / jñānāt eva paramātmatattvajñānāt eva / na tu tapaḥprabhṛtibhyaḥ labhyate //MT_2,10.20//
GSP27motik_2u:421: saṃsārottaraṇe jantor upāyo jñānam eva hi / tapo dānaṃ tathā tīrtham aṇūpāyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ //MU_2,10.21//
GSP27motik_2u:423: tarhi janānāṃ jñānaṃ kathaṃ setsyatīty āśaṅkya cintayati
GSP27motik_2u:424: tat tāvad duḥkhamokṣārthaṃ janasyāsya mahātmanaḥ / pratyagraṃ taruṇopāyam āśu prakaṭayāmy aham //MU_2,10.22//
GSP27motik_2u:427: iti saṃcintya bhagavān brahmā kamalasaṃbhavaḥ / manasā parisaṃkalpya mām utpāditavān imam //MU_2,10.23//
GSP27motik_2u:428: mām proktasvacintodbhavasthānabhūtānām upadeśakārāṇāṃ madhye mukhyabhūtaṃ tvādṛśajanajñānotpādanasamarthaṃ mokṣopāyākhyaśāstropadeśakaṃ vasiṣṭhākhyaṃ mām / manaseti rāhoḥ śira itivat prayogaḥ //MT_2,10.23//

GSP27motik_2u:671: avaśyam iha hi vicāre kṛte sakaladuḥkhakṣayo bhavatīti mantavyam //MU_2,12.12//
GSP27motik_2u:674: nāto vicāradṛṣṭayo 'vahelayā draṣṭavyāḥ / vicāravaśataḥ puruṣeṇa sakalam idam ādhipañjaraṃ sarpeṇa tvacam iva paripakvāṃ parityajya vigatajvareṇa śītalāntaḥkaraṇena vinoda iva jagad akhilam ālokyate samyagdarśanavatā //MU_2,12.13//
GSP27motik_2u:675: samyagdarśanavatetyantaṃ / ṭīkā / yataḥ paramārthatattvaṃ vicārād eva labhyate ataḥ vicāradṛṣṭayaḥ vicārākhyāḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ / avahelayā anādareṇa / na draṣṭavyāḥ / nanu kiṃ vicāreṇa setsyatīty / atrāha / vicāreti / vicāravaśataḥ samyagdarśanavatā samyagdarśanayuktena satā puruṣeṇa / akhilam bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ ca sarvaṃ / jagat vinoda iva krīḍā ivālokyate / tadbhāvābhāvaprayuktaharṣaśokarahitatvāt / puruṣeṇa kathaṃbhūtena / sakalam idam anubhūyamānam / ādhipañjaram vikalpākhyaṃ pañjaram / sarpeṇa paripakvāṃ tvacam iva parityajya vigatajvareṇa tāparahitenāta eva śītalāntaḥkaraṇena //MT_2,12.13//
GSP27motik_2u:676: nanv asamyagdarśanavattvasya ko doṣo yena vicārāt samyagdarśanavattvam āśrīyate ity / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:677: asamyagdarśanavato hi paraṃ duḥkham idaṃ / viṣamo hy atitarāṃ saṃsārarogo bhogīva daśati / asir iva cchinatti / śara iva vedhayati / rajjur iva veṣṭayati / pāvaka iva dahati / rātrir ivāndhayati / aśaṅkitaparipātitaparuṣapāṣāṇa iva vivaśīkaroti / harati prajñāṃ / nāśayati sthitim / pātayati mohāndhakūpe / tṛṣṇayā jarjarīkaroti / na tad asti kiṃcid duḥkhaṃ saṃsārī yan na prāpnoti //MU_2,12.14//
GSP27motik_2u:678: prāpnotītyantaṃ / ṭīkā / param agrakoṭiṃ yātam / nanu kena kṛtaṃ duḥkham asyāsamyagdarśanavataḥ syād ity / atrāha / viṣama iti / vedhayati tāḍayati / viśeṣeṇa kathanam aśakyaṃ jñātvā sāmānyena kathayati / na tad iti / saṃsārī saṃsārayuktaḥ / ataḥ saṃsārakṛtam evehāsamyagdarśanavato duḥkham astīti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,12.14//
GSP27motik_2u:679: nanu viṣayarūpo 'yaṃ saṃsāra evam eva bhavati / kim asmākaṃ karotīty / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:680: duranteyaṃ kila viṣayaviṣamaviṣaviṣūcikā / yadi na cikitsyate tad atitarāṃ narakanagaranikaraphalānubandhinī tat tat karoti / yatra śitāsiśatapāta utpalatāḍanam / agnidāho himāvaseko / 'ṅgavikartanaṃ candanacakrakaracanā / ghūrṇadvātāntaḥ paripeṣo 'ṅgaparimālanam / anavaratānalajvālāvicalitacāmaranārācanikaranipāto nidāghavinodanadhārāgṛhaśīkaravarṣaṇam / śiraśchedaḥ sukhanidrā / mūkīkaraṇaṃ pāṭavamudrā mahān upacayaḥ //MU_2,12.15//
GSP27motik_2u:681: mahān upacaya ityantaṃ / ṭīkā / durantā nāśayitum aśakyā / viṣayāḥ saṃsārikāḥ bhogāḥ / te eva viṣamaviṣaviṣūcikā / sā yadi na cikitsyate / tat tadā / atitarām narakanagarāṇāṃ yaḥ nikaraḥ samūhaḥ / sa eva phalaṃ / tasya anubandhaḥ pravāhena pravartanaṃ / saḥ asyām astīti tādṛśī satī sā / tat tat tādṛśaṃ tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ karoti / tat kim ity apekṣāyām āha / yatreti / yatra yasmin duḥkhe sati / yadduḥkham apekṣyeti yāvat / ghūrṇan sphuran yaḥ vātaḥ / tasyāntaḥ madhye / paripeṣaḥ cūrṇībhāvaḥ / aṅgaparimālanam aṅgakomalatāpādakaṃ mardanaṃ bhavati / vātamadhye cūrṇībhāvād api tatkaṣṭataram iti bhāvaḥ / anavaratāḥ yāḥ analajvālāḥ / tā eva vicalitacāmarāṇi yasmin / tādṛśaḥ yaḥ nārācanikaraḥ / tasya nipātaḥ / nidāghasya arthāt nidāghakṛtatāpasya / vinodanārthaṃ dūrīkaraṇārthaṃ yāni dhārāgṛhāṇi / teṣāṃ ye śīkarāḥ / teṣāṃ varṣaṇaṃ bhavati / pāṭavamudrāḥ pāṭavasya cāturyasya / mudrā saṃkocaḥ / kṛśateti yāvat / mahān upacayaḥ vṛddhiḥ bhavati //MT_2,12.15//
GSP27motik_2u:683: tad evaṃvidhe kaṣṭaceṣṭāsahasradāruṇe saṃsāracapalayantre 'smin rāghava nāvahelā kartavyā / avaśyam idaṃ hi vicāraṇīyam //MU_2,12.16//
GSP27motik_2u:684: vicāraṇīyam ityantaṃ / ṭīkā / tat tato hetoḥ / he rāghava / evaṃvidhe pūrvoktamahākaṭhinaduḥkhadāyini / ata eva kaṣṭaceṣṭāsahasradāruṇe asmin anubhūyamāne / saṃsāra eva capalayantram tasmin / avahelā kiṃ mamāyaṃ karotīti anādaraḥ / na kartavyā / punaḥ kiṃ kāryam ity / atrāhāvaśyam iti / paṇḍitaiḥ avaśyam idam ayaṃ saṃsāraḥ / vicāraṇīyam / kim ayam / idam iti vicāraviṣayatāṃ nayet //MT_2,12.16//
GSP27motik_2u:686: evaṃ cāvaboddhavyam yathā kilāsti vicārāc chreyo'vāptir iti //MU_2,12.17//
GSP27motik_2u:687: itītyantaṃ / ṭīkā / puruṣeṇaivaṃ ca boddhavyam niśceyam / evaṃ kathaṃ / yathā kila niścaye / vicārāt śreyo'vāptiḥ mokṣaprāptir astīti //MT_2,12.17//
GSP27motik_2u:688: nanv ayaṃ vivekaḥ kasyacid asty athavā nety / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:689: anyac ca raghukulendo / yadi naite mahānto munayo maharṣayaś ca viprāś ca rājānaś ca jñānakavacenāvaguṇṭhitaśarīrās tat katham aduḥkhakṣamā api duḥkhamayīṃ tamovṛttipūrvakasaṃsārakadarthanām anubhavantaḥ satatam eva muditamanasas tiṣṭhanti //MU_2,12.18//
GSP27motik_2u:690: tiṣṭhantītyantaṃ / ṭīkā / he raghukulendo / aham anyac ca / bravīmīti śeṣaḥ / yadi ete puraḥsthāḥ / mahāntaḥ munayaḥ maharṣayaś ca viprāś ca rājānaś ca jñānakavacena vivekākhyakavacenāvaguṇṭhitāni valitāni / śarīrāṇi yeṣāṃ te / tādṛśāḥ jñānayuktā iti yāvat / na bhavanti / tat tadā / ete munyādayaḥ aduḥkhakṣamāḥ api katham duḥkhamayīṃ / tathā tamovṛttipūrvikā tamovṛttikāraṇā / yā saṃsārakadarthanā saṃsārakleśaḥ / tām anubhavantaḥ / satatam eva na tu abhimataprāptyā kadācid eva / muditamanasaḥ tiṣṭhanti / ataḥ asty evaiṣāṃ viveka iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,12.18//
GSP27motik_2u:692: iha hi vikautukā vigatavikalpaviplavā yathā sthitā hariharapadmajādayaḥ / narottamāḥ samadhigatātmadīpakās tathā sthitā jagati vibuddhabuddhayaḥ //MU_2,12.19//
GSP27motik_2u:693: padyāntaṃ / ṭīkā / hi yasmāt / iha jagati / narottamāḥ narebhyaḥ samastamanuṣyebhyaḥ teṣāṃ madhye vā uttamāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ / tathā samadhigataḥ vivekavibhavena samyag anubhūtaḥ / ātmā eva paramātmā eva / dīpaḥ yaiḥ te / tādṛśāḥ vibuddhabuddhayaḥ vivekayuktabuddhayaḥ pūrvoktāḥ munyādayaḥ / tathā tiṣṭhanti / tathā katham ity apekṣāyām āha / vikautukā iti / vikautukāḥ viṣayākāṅkṣārahitāḥ / ādiśabdenendrādīnāṃ grahaṇam //MT_2,12.19//
GSP27motik_2u:695: tathā ca parikṣīṇe mohe galati ca ghane 'jñānajalade parijñāte tattve samadhigata ātmany abhimate / vicāryāryaiḥ sārdhaṃ galitavapuṣor vai sadasator dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanaṃ jāgatam idam //MU_2,12.20//
GSP27motik_2u:696: padyāntaṃ / ṭīkā / tathā ca sati / vai niścaye / āryaiḥ sadbhiḥ sārdham / vicārya saṃsāram ātmatattvaṃ ca vicārya / mohe ajñānakārye sāvadhānatve parigalite sati / tataḥ ghane nibiḍe / ajñānajalade ajñānam eva ca / galati sati / tataḥ sadasatoḥ sadasadbuddhiviṣayībhūtayoḥ arthayoḥ / sadasadbuddhiparigalanena galitavapuṣoḥ satoḥ / tataḥ abhimate paramopādeye / ātmani tattve jīvākhye tattve / parijñāte dehādivyatiriktatayā samyak niścite sati / na kevalaṃ parijñāte kiṃ tu samadhigate dehādityāgena svātmatayā samyag anubhūte sati / tataḥ tattve jīvādisākṣitayā sthite śuddhacinmātratattve / dhiyā galanonmukhayā buddhyā / dṛṣṭe jīvasattāpradatvena dṛṣṭe sati / idam kriyamāṇam / jāgataṃ jagatsaṃbandhi / aṭanam śarīrayātrānimittaṃ vyavaharaṇam / ramaṇam krīḍā bhavati / padārthaniṣṭabhāvābhāvakṛtaharṣaśokasparśakāritvābhāvād iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,12.20//
GSP27motik_2u:698: anyac ca rāghava prasanne cittattve hṛdi savibhave valgati pare samābhogībhūtāsv akhilakalanādṛṣṭiṣu puraḥ / śamaṃ yāntīṣv antaḥkaraṇaghaṭanāsv āhitarasaṃ dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanaṃ jāgatam idam //MU_2,12.21//
GSP27motik_2u:699: padyāntaṃ / ṭīkā / he rāghavāham anyac ca bravīmi / kiṃ bravīṣīty / atrāha / prasanne iti / pare uttīrṇe / cittattve śuddhacinmātrākhye tattve / prasanne svaprakāśanaparatayā prasādonmukhe sati / ata eva tasmin pare cittattve savibhave śaktisahite / hṛdi sattvabhāvena sthite / hṛdi valgati sphurati sati / vimarśaviṣayatām āyāte satīti yāvat / tataḥ akhilakalanādṛṣṭiṣu samastajīvādikalanārūpāsu dṛṣṭiṣu / samābhogībhūtāsu satīṣu / vyāpakacinmātrasvarūpatāsādanena vistārarahitāsv api vistārayuktāsu saṃpannāsu satīṣu / tataḥ antaḥkaraṇaghaṭanāsu antaḥkaraṇaracanāsu / āhitarasaṃ svecchayā / śamaṃ cinmātrasvarūpe layaṃ / puraḥ agre yāntīṣu / tataś ca dhiyā galanonmukhayā buddhyā / tattve śuddhacinmātrākhye tattve / dṛṣṭe ātmatayānubhūte sati / idaṃ jāgatam aṭanaṃ ramaṇaṃ bhavati //MT_2,12.21//
GSP27motik_2u:701: anyac ca rathaḥ sphāro dehas turagaracanā cendriyagatiḥ parispando vātād aham akalitānantaviṣamaḥ / paro vārvā dehī jagati viharāmīty anaghayā dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanaṃ jāgatam idaṃ //MU_2,12.22//
GSP27motik_2u:702: sargāntaślokaṃ tāvat / ṭīkā / dehaḥ sthūladehaḥ / sphāraḥ sarvatra sphuraṇaśīlaḥ / rathaḥ bhavati / indriyagatiḥ indriyaracanā turagaracanā bhavati / heyopādeyarūpādiprāptiparihārārthaṃ darśanādidvāreṇa deharathacālakatvāt / parispandaḥ turagaracanābhūtānāṃ indriyagatīnāṃ ceṣṭā dehaṃ prati preraṇasāmarthyaṃ vātāt bhavati / vātena hi indriyāṇi darśanādikriyābhāñji santi dehaṃ cālayanti / vā pakṣāntare / dehī dehābhimānī jīvaḥ / arvā turagaḥ bhavati / paryantataḥ tasyaiva dehacālakatvāt / puraḥ dehādibhyaḥ uttīrṇaśuddhacinmātrarūpaḥ aham jagati viharāmi vihāraṃ karomi / ahaṃ kathaṃbhūtaḥ / akalitāni svātmatvaniścayena duḥkhadatvenāniścitāni / anantāni viṣamāni sukhaduḥkharūpāḥ saṃkaṭāḥ yena / tādṛśaḥ / rājā hi rathādibhyaḥ paraḥ san akalitānantanimnonnataś ca bhavati / iti anena niścayena / anaghayā svasmin baddhatvajñānādidoṣarahitayā / dhiyā galanonmukhayā buddhyā / tattve proktasvarūpe tattve / dṛṣṭe sati / idam jāgatam aṭanaṃ ramaṇaṃ bhavati / iti śivam //MT_2,12.22//
GSP27motik_2u:703: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe dvādaśaḥ sargaḥ // 2,12 //
GSP27motik_2u:704: oṃ pūrvoktāṃ dṛṣṭim anūdya tadavaṣṭaṃbhena subuddhīnāṃ vicaraṇaṃ kathayati
GSP27motik_2u:705: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya puṣṭātmānaḥ subuddhayaḥ / vicaranty asamunnaddhā mahānto 'bhyuditā iva //MU_2,13.1//
GSP27motik_2u:706: etāṃ pūrvasargoktām / avaṣṭabhya satataṃ vimarṣaviṣayaṃ kṛtvā / puṣṭātmānaḥ / puṣṭaḥ atyantābhivyaktiyogyatāṃ gataḥ / ātmā śuddhacinmātrākhya ātmā yeṣāṃ te / tādṛśāḥ asamunnaddhāḥ darparahitāḥ / abhyuditāḥ iva prāptarājyā iva //MT_2,13.1//
GSP27motik_2u:707: na śocanti na yācante na vāñchanti śubhāśubham / sarvam eva ca kurvanti kurvanti na ca kiṃcana //MU_2,13.2//
GSP27motik_2u:708: sarvam eva pravāhāgataṃ sarvam eva / kurvanti kartavyam iti niścayena kurvanti / kiṃcana na kurvanti svasmin kartṛtvābhimānābhāvāt //MT_2,13.2//
GSP27motik_2u:709: svastham evāvatiṣṭhanti svasthaṃ kurvanti yānti ca / heyopādeyatāpakṣarahitāḥ svātmani sthitāḥ //MU_2,13.3//
GSP27motik_2u:710: svastham ity ubhayatra kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ niścitam ity arthaḥ / heyopādeyatāpakṣarahitāḥ upekṣāpakṣe sthitā ity arthaḥ //MT_2,13.3//
GSP27motik_2u:711: āyānti ca na cāyānti vanaṃ yānti na yānti ca / na kurvanty api kurvanti na vadanti vadanti ca //MU_2,13.4//
GSP27motik_2u:712: atra sarvatrāpi kriyākaraṇaṃ jīvanmuktatayāśritadehādidvāreṇa jñeyam / akaraṇaṃ tv aśuddhacinmātratvadvāreṇety alam //MT_2,13.4//
GSP27motik_2u:713: ye kecana samārambhā yāś ca kāścana dṛṣṭayaḥ / heyādeyadṛśo yās tāḥ kṣīyante 'dhigate pade //MU_2,13.5//
GSP27motik_2u:714: kṣīyante līyante / parapadarūpatayaiva sphuranti iti yāvat //MT_2,13.5//
GSP27motik_2u:715: parityaktasamastehaṃ mano madhuravṛttimat / sarvataḥ sukham abhyeti candrabimba iva sthitam //MU_2,13.6//
GSP27motik_2u:717: api nirmananārambham apy astākhilakautukam / ātmany eva na māty antar indāv iva rasāyanam //MU_2,13.7//
GSP27motik_2u:718: ātmany eva na māti na prabhavati / atyantānandamayatvād iti bhāvaḥ / mananārambharahitasya kautukarahitasya ca ānandena svātmani amānaṃ na yuktam iti lokaprasiddhir apiśabdābhiprāyaḥ / rasāyanam amṛtam //MT_2,13.7//
GSP27motik_2u:719: na karotīndrajālāni nānudhāvati vāsanām / bālacāpalam utsṛjya pūrṇam eva virājate //MU_2,13.8//
GSP27motik_2u:720: indrajālāni mantrādiprabhāvena siddhāni ākāśagamanādīni / vāsanām nānudhāvati api tu tato nivṛttim eva karoti / bālavat cāpalam bālacāpalam utsṛjya / pūrṇam tṛptisahitaṃ yathā bhavati / tathā virājate //MT_2,13.8//
GSP27motik_2u:721: ātmatattvāvalokanasyaiva pūrvoktāsu vṛttiṣu kāraṇatvaṃ gadyena kathayati  evaṃvidhā hi vṛttaya ātmatattvāvalokanāl labhyante / nānyatas / tasmād vicāreṇātmaivānveṣṭavya upāsanīyo jñātavyo yāvajjīvaṃ puruṣena netarad iti //MU_2,13.9//
GSP27motik_2u:722: itītyantaṃ / ṭīkā / hi yasmāt / evaṃvidhāḥ pūrvoktāḥ / vṛttayaḥ vyāpārāḥ / ātmatattvasya paramātmasvarūpasya / yad avalokanaṃ / tasmād eva / puruṣeṇa labhyante / nānyataḥ / tasmād puruṣeṇa yāvajjīvaṃ vicāreṇātmaivānveṣṭavyaḥ / kiṃrūpo 'sāv iti vimarśanīyaḥ / tataḥ upāsanīyaḥ / upāsanaṃ cātra avicchinnapravāheṇānusandhānaviṣayīkaraṇam eva jñeyam / tataḥ jñātavyaḥ / sthūladehādivyatirekena sthūladehavat niḥsaṃśayam ātmatattvena jñātavyaḥ / itarat sthūladehādi / na jñātavyam / itiśabdaḥ gadyasamāptau //MT_2,13.9//
GSP27motik_2u:723: nanv ātmāvalokanaṃ kartavyatvena tvayā pratipāditaṃ / tadavalokanaṃ kathaṃ setsyatīty / atra padyenāha
GSP27motik_2u:724: svānubhūteḥ suśāstrasya guroś caivaikavākyatā / yatrābhyāsena tenātmā santatenāvalokyate //MU_2,13.10//
GSP27motik_2u:725: svā nijā / yā anubhūtiḥ / tasyāḥ / suśāstrasya śobhanaśāstrasya / guroḥ sadguroś / ca iti trayasya / yatra yasmin abhyāse / ekavākyatā arthāt melanaṃ syāt / santatenāvicchinnena / tenābhyāsena karaṇena / puruṣeṇa kartrā / ātmāvalokyate //MT_2,13.10//
GSP27motik_2u:726: avahelitaśāstrārthair avajñātamahājanaiḥ / kaṣṭām apy āpadaṃ prāpto na mūḍhaiḥ samatām iyāt //MU_2,13.11//
GSP27motik_2u:727: svasthas tu katham iyād ity apiśabdābhiprāyaḥ //MT_2,13.11//
GSP27motik_2u:729: na vyādhir na viṣaṃ nāpat tathā nāmāsti bhūtale / khedāya svaśarīrasthaṃ maurkhyam eva yathā nṛṇām //MU_2,13.12//
GSP27motik_2u:731: kiṃcitsaṃskṛtabuddhīnāṃ śravyaṃ śāstram idaṃ yathā / maurkhyāpahaṃ tathā śāstram anyad asti na kiṃcana //MU_2,13.13//
GSP27motik_2u:732: kiṃcitsaṃskṛtabuddhīnām padapadārthajñānām ity arthaḥ / śravyam śravaṇārham / idaṃ mokṣopāyākhyam / maurkhyāpahaṃ maurkhyam upahantīti maurkhyāpaham //MT_2,13.13//
GSP27motik_2u:733: idaṃ śravyaṃ sukhakaraṃ kathādṛṣṭāntasundaram / aviruddham aśeṣeṇa śāstravākyārthabandhunā //MU_2,13.14//
GSP27motik_2u:734: kathābhiḥ vakṣyamāṇāḥ dṛṣṭāntāḥ kathādṛṣṭāntāḥ / taiḥ sundaram / śāstravākyānāṃ yaḥ arthaḥ / sa eva bandhuḥ / tena aviruddham / śāstrārthānusārīty arthaḥ //MT_2,13.14//
GSP27motik_2u:735: āpado yā duruttārā yāś ca tucchāḥ kuyonayaḥ / tās tā maurkhyāt prasūyante khadirāt kaṇṭhakā iva //MU_2,13.15//
GSP27motik_2u:737: varaṃ śarāvahastasya caṇḍālāgāravīthiṣu / bhikṣārtham aṭanaṃ rāma na maurkhyahatajīvitam //MU_2,13.16//
GSP27motik_2u:739: imam ālokam āsādya mokṣopāyamayaṃ janaḥ / andhatām eti na punaḥ kaścin mohatamasy api //MU_2,13.17//
GSP27motik_2u:741: tāvan nayati saṃkocaṃ tṛṣṇā śyāmā narāmbujam / yāvad vivekasūryasya noditā vimalā prabhā //MU_2,13.18//
GSP27motik_2u:743: saṃsāraduḥkhamokṣārthaṃ mādṛśaiḥ saha bandhubhiḥ / svarūpam ātmano jñātvā guruśāstrapramāṇataḥ //MU_2,13.19//
GSP27motik_2u:744: mādṛśaiḥ sādhubhir ity arthaḥ / guruśāstrākhyaṃ yat pramāṇaṃ pramākaraṇaṃ / tasmāt guruśāstrapramāṇataḥ / jñātvety asyānantaraṃ stheyam iti śeṣaḥ //MT_2,13.19//
GSP27motik_2u:745: jīvanmuktāś carantīha yathā hariharādayaḥ / yathā brahmarṣayaś cānye tathā vihara rāghava //MU_2,13.20//
GSP27motik_2u:747: anantānīha duḥkhāni sukhaṃ kṣaṇalavopamam / nātaḥ sukheṣu badhnīyād dṛṣṭiṃ duḥkhānubandhiṣu //MU_2,13.21//
GSP27motik_2u:750: yad anantam anāyāsaṃ tat padaṃ sārasiddhaye / sādhanīyaṃ prayatnena puruṣeṇa vijānatā //MU_2,13.22//
GSP27motik_2u:751: anantam trividhaparicchedarahitam / anāyāsaṃ āyāsasādhyatvābhāvāt / sārasiddhaye paramapuruṣārthasiddhaye / sādhanīyaṃ svopalabdhiviṣayatāṃ neyam / vijānatā kiṃcinmātrajñānayuktena mūrkhasyātrānadhikaratvāt //MT_2,13.22//
GSP27motik_2u:752: ta eva puruṣārthasya bhājanaṃ puruṣottamāḥ / anuttamapadālambi mano yeṣāṃ gatajvaram //MU_2,13.23//
GSP27motik_2u:753: avidyamāna uttamaḥ yasmāt tat anuttamam niratiśayam iti yāvat / tādṛśaṃ yat padam / tat ālambate iti tādṛśam //MT_2,13.23//
GSP27motik_2u:754: saṃbhogāśanamātreṣu rājyādiṣu sukheṣu ye / saṃtuṣṭā duṣṭamanaso viddhi tān andhadundubhān //MU_2,13.24//
GSP27motik_2u:755: andhadundubhān andharājilān / asamyag darśitvād ity arthaḥ //MT_2,13.24//
GSP27motik_2u:756: ye śaṭheṣu duranteṣu duṣkṛtārambhaśāliṣu / dviṣatsu mitrarūpeṣu bhaktā vai bhogabhogiṣu //MU_2,13.25//
GSP27motik_2u:757: te yānti durgamād durgaṃ duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ bhayād bhayam / narakān narakaṃ mūḍhā mohamantharabuddhayaḥ //MU_2,13.26//
GSP27motik_2u:758: mitrarūpeṣu dviṣatsu ā mukhe sukhakāritvāt mohamantharā mohanirbharā / buddhiḥ yeṣāṃ te / tādṛśāḥ //MT_2,13.25-26//
GSP27motik_2u:759: parasparavināśotke śreyasyau na kadācana / sukhaduḥkhadaśe rāma taḍitprasarabhaṅgure //MU_2,13.27//
GSP27motik_2u:761: ye viraktā mahātmānaḥ suviviktā bhavādṛśaḥ / puruṣān viddhi tān vandyān bhogamokṣaikabhāginaḥ //MU_2,13.28//
GSP27motik_2u:762: bhogabhāktvaṃ caiṣāṃ pravāhagatam eva jñeyaṃ / na yatnasādhitam //MT_2,13.28//
GSP27motik_2u:763: vivekaṃ param āśritya vairāgyābhyāsayogataḥ / saṃsārasaritaṃ ghorām imām āpadam uttaret //MU_2,13.29//
GSP27motik_2u:765: na suptavyaṃ tu saṃsāramāyāsv iha hi jānatā / viṣamūrcchanasaṃmohadāyinīṣu vivekinā //MU_2,13.30//
GSP27motik_2u:767: saṃsāram imam āsādya yas tiṣṭhaty avahelayā / jvalitasya gṛhasyoccaiḥ śete tārṇasya so 'ntare //MU_2,13.31//
GSP27motik_2u:769: yat prāpya na nivartante yad āsādya na śocyate / tat padaṃ śemuṣīlabhyam asty evātra na saṃśayaḥ //MU_2,13.32//
GSP27motik_2u:770: śemuṣīlabhyam eva buddhilabhyam eva / na tu bāhyayatnalabhyam //MT_2,13.32//
GSP27motik_2u:771: nanu yadi tat padaṃ nāsti tat kiṃ śemuṣyā labhyate ity / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:772: nāsti cet tad vicāreṇa doṣaḥ ko bhavatāṃ bhavet / asti cet tat samuttīrṇā bhaviṣyatha bhavārṇavāt //MU_2,13.33//
GSP27motik_2u:774: pravṛttiḥ puruṣasyeha mokṣopāyavicāraṇe / yadā bhavaty āśu tadā mokṣabhāgī sa ucyate //MU_2,13.34//
GSP27motik_2u:776: anapāyi nirāśaṅkaṃ svāsthyaṃ vigatavibhramam / na vinā kevalībhāvaṃ vidyate bhuvanatraye //MU_2,13.35//
GSP27motik_2u:777: svāsthyam svasthatā / kevalībhāvaṃ vinā advitīyatāṃ vinā //MT_2,13.35//
GSP27motik_2u:778: tatprāptāv uttamaprāptau na kleśa upayujyate / na mitrāṇy upakurvanti na dhanāni na bāndhavāḥ //MU_2,13.36//
GSP27motik_2u:780: na hastapādacalanaṃ na deśāntarasaṃgamaḥ / kleśātiśayasādhyo vā na tīrthāyatanāśrayaḥ //MU_2,13.37//
GSP27motik_2u:781: asminn arthe hastapādādicalanaṃ na bhavati / deśāntarasaṃgamaḥ ca na bhavati / ayam arthaḥ kleśātiśayasādhyaḥ na bhavati / tīrthāyatanāśrayaḥ ca na bhavati //MT_2,13.37//
GSP27motik_2u:782: puruṣārthaikasādhyena vāsanaikārthakarmaṇā / kevalaṃ tan manomātrajayenāsādyate padam //MU_2,13.38//
GSP27motik_2u:783: puruṣeṇa tat kevalībhāvākhyaṃ padam / evalam manomātrajayena āsādyate prāpyate / manomātrajayena kathaṃbhūtena / puruṣārthena pauruṣeṇa / ekam kevalaṃ sādhyena / punaḥ kathaṃbhūtena vāsanaikārthakarmaṇā / vāsanā bhāvanā / sā eva ekārthaḥ / tasya karmaṇā / bhāvanāmātrasādhyenety arthaḥ //MT_2,13.38//
GSP27motik_2u:784: vivekamātrasādhyaṃ tadvicāraikāntaniścayam / tyajatā duḥkhajālāni nareṇa tad avāpyate //MU_2,13.39//
GSP27motik_2u:785: tadvicāreṇa tadviṣayeṇa vivekena / ekaṃ kevalaṃ / niścayaḥ yasya / tam / vicāraniśceyam ity arthaḥ / tat kevalībhāvākhyaṃ padam //MT_2,13.39//
GSP27motik_2u:786: sukhasevyāsanasthena tadvicāravatā svayam / na śocyate padaṃ prāpya na ca bhūyo 'bhijāyate //MU_2,13.40//
GSP27motik_2u:787: tadvicāravatā kevalībhāvavicārayuktena / tat padaṃ kevalībhāvākhyaṃ padam //MT_2,13.40//
GSP27motik_2u:788: tat samastasukhāsārasīmāntaṃ sādhavo viduḥ / tad anuttamaniṣṣyandaṃ param āhū rasāyanam //MU_2,13.41//
GSP27motik_2u:790: kṣayitvāt sarvabhāvānāṃ svargamānuṣyayor dvayoḥ / sukhaṃ nāsty eva salilaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāsv ivaitayoḥ //MU_2,13.42//
GSP27motik_2u:792: ato manojayaś cintyaḥ śamasaṃtoṣasādhanaḥ / anantaśamasaṃbhogas tasmād ānanda āpyate //MU_2,13.43//
GSP27motik_2u:793: ataḥ kāraṇāt / puruṣeṇa manojayaḥ cintyaḥ / kathaṃbhūtaḥ / śamasaṃtoṣau sādhanaṃ yasya / tādṛśaḥ puruṣaḥ / tasmāt manojayāt / anantaśamasya saṃbhogaḥ camatkāraḥ / śamāsvādarūpaḥ iti yāvat / ānandaḥ āpyate prāpyate //MT_2,13.43//
GSP27motik_2u:794: jīvatā gacchatā caiva bhramatā patatā tathā / rakṣasā dānavenāpi devena puruṣeṇa vā //MU_2,13.44//
GSP27motik_2u:795: manaḥpraśamanodbhūtaṃ tat prāpya paramaṃ sukhaṃ / vikāsiśamapuṣpasya vivekoccataroḥ phalam //MU_2,13.45//
GSP27motik_2u:796: vyavahārapareṇāpi kāryavṛndam acinvatā / bhānunevāmbarasthena nojjhyate na ca vāñchyate //MU_2,13.46//
GSP27motik_2u:797: jīvatā gacchatā bhramatā / atha patatā / upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat / sarvāḥ kriyāḥ kurvateti yāvat / rakṣasā dānavenāpi devena puruṣeṇa vā manaḥpraśamanodbhūtaṃ tathā vikāsiśamapuṣpasya vivekoccataroḥ phalam / tat paramaṃ sukham nirvāṇākhyaṃ sukhaṃ / prāpyāmbarasthena bhānunā iva nojjhyate na ca vāñchyate sūryavat upekṣām eva sarvatra kriyate ity arthaḥ / rakṣaḥprabhṛtinā kathaṃbhūtena / vyavahārapareṇāpi kāryavṛndam kāryasamūham / acinvatā nāhaṃkarteti niścayāt svakṛtatvenānanubhavatā //MT_2,13.44-46//
GSP27motik_2u:798: manaḥ praśāntam atyacchaṃ viśrāntaṃ gatavibhramam / anīhaṃ vigatābhīṣṭaṃ nābhivāñchati nojjhati //MU_2,13.47//
GSP27motik_2u:799: anīham vikalpākhyaceṣṭārahitam / vigatābhīṣṭam abhīṣṭam idam iti niścayarahitam / pravāhāgatam upekṣayā eva karotīti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,13.47//
GSP27motik_2u:801: mokṣadvāre dvārapālān imāñ śṛṇu yathākramam / yeṣām ekatamāsaktyā mokṣadvāre praviśyate //MU_2,13.48//
GSP27motik_2u:804: duḥkhadoṣadaśā dīrghā saṃsāramarumaṇḍalī / jantoḥ śītalatām eti śītalena śamāmbunā //MU_2,13.49//
GSP27motik_2u:806: śamenāsādyate śreyaḥ śamo hi paramaṃ padam / śamaḥ śivaṃ śamaḥ śāntiḥ śamo bhrāntinivāraṇam //MU_2,13.50//
GSP27motik_2u:808: puṃsaḥ praśamatṛptasya śītalācchatarātmanaḥ / śamatoṣitacittasya śatrur apy eti mitratām //MU_2,13.51//
GSP27motik_2u:809: dveṣeṇaiva hi śatruḥ śatruḥ bhavati / sa ca tasya nāstīti tasya śatruḥ mitratām etīti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,13.51//
GSP27motik_2u:810: śamacandramasā yeṣām āśayaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ / kṣīrābdhīnām ivodeti teṣāṃ paramaśuddhatā //MU_2,13.52//
GSP27motik_2u:812: hṛtkuśeśayakośeṣu yeṣāṃ śamakuśeśayam / satāṃ vikasitaṃ te hi dvihṛtpadmāḥ samā hareḥ //MU_2,13.53//
GSP27motik_2u:813: harer dvihṛtpadmatvaṃ nābhisthasya padmasya sthitatvāj jñeyam //MT_2,13.53//
GSP27motik_2u:814: śamaśrīḥ śobhate yeṣāṃ mukhendāv akalaṅkite / te 'mī kulendavo vandyāḥ saundaryavijitendavaḥ //MU_2,13.54//
GSP27motik_2u:816: trailokyodaravartinyo nānandāya tathā śriyaḥ / sāmrājyasaṃpatpratimā yathā śamavibhūtayaḥ //MU_2,13.55//
GSP27motik_2u:818: yāni duḥkhāni yās tṛṣṇā duḥsahā ye durādhayaḥ / tat sarvaṃ śāntacetassu tamo 'rkeṣv iva naśyati //MU_2,13.56//
GSP27motik_2u:820: mano hi sarvabhūtānāṃ prasādam anugacchati / na tathendau yathā śānte jane janitakautukam //MU_2,13.57//
GSP27motik_2u:822: śamaśālini sauhārdavati sarveṣu jantuṣu / sujane paramaṃ tattvaṃ svayam eva prasīdati //MU_2,13.58//
GSP27motik_2u:823: paramaṃ tattvam paramātmatattvaṃ / svayam evāyatnam eva / prasīdati svarūpadarśanākhyaṃ prasādaṃ karotīty arthaḥ //MT_2,13.58//
GSP27motik_2u:824: mātarīva paraṃ yānti viṣamāṇi mṛdūni ca / viśvāsam iha bhūtāni sarvāṇi śamaśālini //MU_2,13.59//
GSP27motik_2u:826: na rasāyanapānena na lakṣmyāliṅganena ca / tathā sukham avāpnoti śamenāntar yathā janaḥ //MU_2,13.60//
GSP27motik_2u:828: sarvādhivyādhivalitaṃ krāntaṃ tṛṣṇāvaratrayā / manaḥ śamāmṛtāsekaiḥ samāśvāsaya rāghava //MU_2,13.61//
GSP27motik_2u:830: yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi śamaśītalayā dhiyā / tat te 'tisvadate svādu netarat tāntamānasam //MU_2,13.62//svadate rocate / camatkāraṃ karotīti yāvat / tāntam mlāniyuktaṃ kṛtaṃ / mānasaṃ yena tat //MT_2,13.62//
GSP27motik_2u:831: śamāmṛtarasāsnātaṃ mano yām eti nirvṛtim / chinnāny api tayāṅgāni manye rohanti rāghava //MU_2,13.63//
GSP27motik_2u:832: śamāmṛtarasāsnātaṃ manaḥ yāṃ nirvṛtiṃ eti / he rāghavāhaṃ manye / tayā nirvṛtyā / chinnāny api aṅgāni rohanti //MT_2,13.63//
GSP27motik_2u:833: na piśācā na rakṣāṃsi na daityā na ca śatravaḥ / na ca vyāghrabhujaṅgādyā dviṣanti śamaśālinam //MU_2,13.64//
GSP27motik_2u:835: susaṃnaddhasamastāṅgaṃ praśamāmṛtavarmaṇā / vedhayanti na duḥkhāni śarā vajraśilāṃ iva //MU_2,13.65//
GSP27motik_2u:837: na tathā rājate rājā mānyāntaḥpurasaṃsthitaḥ / samayā svasthayā vṛttyā yathopaśamaśobhitaḥ //MU_2,13.66//
GSP27motik_2u:839: prāṇāt priyataraṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭim eti na tāṃ janaḥ / yām āyāti janaṃ śāntam avalokya samāśayam //MU_2,13.67//
GSP27motik_2u:841: samayā śamaśālinyā vṛttyā yaḥ sādhu vartate / abhinanditayā loke jīvatīha sa netaraḥ //MU_2,13.68//
GSP27motik_2u:843: anuddhatamanāḥ śāntaḥ sādhu karma karoti yat / tat sarvam abhinandanti tasyemā bhūtajātayaḥ //MU_2,13.69//
GSP27motik_2u:846: śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhuktvā ghrātvā śubhāśubham / na hṛṣyati glāyati yaḥ sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.70//
GSP27motik_2u:848: yaḥ samaḥ sarvabhāveṣu nābhivāñchati nojjhati / jitvendriyāṇi yatnena sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.71//
GSP27motik_2u:850: tuṣārakarabimbācchaṃ mano yasya nirākulam / maraṇotsavayuddheṣu sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.72//
GSP27motik_2u:852: sthito 'pi na sthita iva na hṛṣyati na kupyati / yaḥ suṣuptamanāḥ svasthaḥ sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.73//
GSP27motik_2u:854: amṛtasyandasubhagā yasya sarvajanaṃ prati / dṛṣṭiḥ prasarati prītā sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.74//
GSP27motik_2u:856: spaṣṭāvadātayā buddhyā yathaivāntas tathā bahiḥ / dṛśyante yasya kāryāṇi sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.75//
GSP27motik_2u:858: apy āpatsu durantāsu kalpānteṣu dahatsv api / tucchehaṃ na mano yasya sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.76//
GSP27motik_2u:860: yo 'ntaḥ śītalatāṃ yāto yo bhāveṣu na majjati / vyavahārī na saṃmūḍhaḥ sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.77//
GSP27motik_2u:861: na majjati rāgodrekeṇāsakto na bhavati / vyavahārī vyavahārakārī / na saṃmūḍhaḥ na vyavahārarahitaḥ / vyavahārarahitasya hi amajjanaṃ vyavahārābhāvakṛtam eva na śāntikṛtam //MT_2,13.77//
GSP27motik_2u:862: ākāśasadṛśī yasya nityaṃ svavyavahāriṇaḥ / kalaṅkam eti na matiḥ sa śānta iti kathyate //MU_2,13.78//
GSP27motik_2u:864: tapasviṣu bahujñeṣu yājakeṣu nṛpeṣu ca / balavatsu guṇāḍhyeṣu śamavān eva rājate //MU_2,13.79//
GSP27motik_2u:866: śamasaṃsaktamanasāṃ mahatāṃ guṇaśālinām / udeti nirvṛtiś cittāj jyotsneva himarociṣaḥ //MU_2,13.80//
GSP27motik_2u:868: sīmānto guṇapūgānāṃ pauruṣaikāntabhūṣaṇam / saṃkaṭeṣv abhayasthānaṃ śamaḥ śrīmān virājate //MU_2,13.81//
GSP27motik_2u:871: śamam amṛtam ahāryam āryajuṣṭaṃ param avalambya padaṃ paraṃ prayātāḥ /
GSP27motik_2u:872: raghutanaya yathā mahānubhāvāḥ kramam anupālaya siddhaye tam eva //MU_2,13.82//
GSP27motik_2u:873: he raghutanaya / mahānubhāvāḥ puruṣāḥ / amṛtam amṛtarūpam / ahāryam anāśyam āryajuṣṭam / śamaṃ pūrvoktasvarūpaṃ śamaṃ avalambya / paraṃ padaṃ paracitsvarūpam utkṛṣṭaṃ sthānaṃ / yathā prayātāḥ / tvam tam tathāvidham / kramam siddhaye anupālaya / iti śivam //MT_2,13.82//
GSP27motik_2u:874: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe trayodaśaḥ sargaḥ // 2,13 //
GSP27motik_2u:876: śāstrāvabodhāmalayā dhiyā paramapūtayā / / kartavyaḥ kāraṇajñena vicāro 'niśam ātmanaḥ //MU_2,14.1//
GSP27motik_2u:877: kāraṇajñena kiṃ / kena saṃpadyate iti jānatā puruṣeṇa / dhiyā ātmanaḥ vicāraḥ aniśam kartavyaḥ //MT_2,14.1//
GSP27motik_2u:878: nanu vicāreṇa kiṃ setsyati ity / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:879: vicārāt tīkṣṇatām etya dhīḥ paśyati paraṃ padam / dīrghasaṃsārarogasya vicāro hi mahauṣadham //MU_2,14.2//
GSP27motik_2u:881: āpadvanam anantehāparipallavitākṛti / vicārakrakacacchinnaṃ naiva bhūyaḥ prarohati //MU_2,14.3//
GSP27motik_2u:882: anantāḥ yāḥ īhāḥ ceṣṭāḥ / tābhiḥ paripallavitā puṣṭībhūtā / ākṛtiḥ yasya tat //MT_2,14.3//
GSP27motik_2u:883: moheṣu bandhunāśeṣu saṃkaṭeṣu bhrameṣu ca / sarveṣv eva mahāprājña vicāro hi satāṃ gatiḥ //MU_2,14.4//
GSP27motik_2u:885: na vicāraṃ vinā kaścid upāyo 'sti vipacchame / vicārād aśubhaṃ tyaktvā śubham āyāti dhīḥ satām //MU_2,14.5//

GSP27motik_2u:1005: ātmanātmani saṃtoṣaṃ yāvad yāti na mānasam / udbhavanty āpadas tāval latā iva manovanāt //MU_2,15.7//

GSP27motik_2u:1027: nityaṃ śītalayā nāma kalaṅkaparihīnayā / puruṣaḥ śuddhayā vṛttyā bhāti pūrṇatayenduvat //MU_2,15.18//
