GSP27motik_2u:1178: nanv atra kiṃ varṇyata ity apekṣāyām āha
GSP27motik_2u:1179: idaṃ jagad ahaṃ tvaṃ ca sa iti bhrāntir utthitā / ity asau śāmyatīty asmin kathyate ślokasaṅgrahe //MU_2,17.33//
GSP27motik_2u:1180: idaṃ jagat ahaṃ tvaṃ ca saḥ / iti evaṃrūpā / bhrāntiḥ utthitā / iti satī eva / śāmyati / iti evam / asmin upaśāntiprakaraṇe kathyate / asmin kathaṃbhūte / ślokānāṃ saṅgrahaḥ yasmin saḥ / tādṛśe / sa iti paramakāraṇaparāmarśaḥ //MT_2,17.33//
GSP27motik_2u:1182: upaśāntiprakaraṇe śrute śāmyati saṃsṛtiḥ / praspaṣṭā vibhrameṇaiva kiṃcillabhyopalambhanā //MU_2,17.34//
GSP27motik_2u:1183: saṃsṛtiḥ kathaṃbhūtā / vibhrameṇaiva viparyayajñānenaiva praspaṣṭā / punaḥ kathaṃbhūtā / kiṃcit leśena / labhyam upalambhanaṃ sparśaḥ yasyāḥ sā / anyathā nirvāṇaprakaraṇaṃ vyarthaṃ syāt iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,17.34//
GSP27motik_2u:1184: nanu tataḥ saṃsṛtiḥ kīdṛśī tiṣṭhatīty apekṣāyām āha
GSP27motik_2u:1185: śatāṃśaśiṣṭā bhavati saṃśāntabhrāntirūpiṇī / anyasaṃkalpacittasthā nagaraśrīr ivāsatī //MU_2,17.35//
GSP27motik_2u:1188: saṃkalpe dṛṣṭaṃ mattābhram saṃkalpamattābhram / śāntaṃ yat saṃkalpamattābhram / tasya yaḥ bhīṣaṇaḥ aśaniśabdaḥ / tadvat //MT_2,17.36//
GSP27motik_2u:1190: vismṛtau yau svapnasaṃkalpau / tayoḥ nirmāṇaṃ yasya / tādṛśaṃ yat nagaraṃ / tenopamā yasyāḥ sā / tathā bhaviṣyannagarodyāne sotsavā samadanā / yā śyāmalā śyāmākhyā strī / tadvat aṅgaṃ svarūpaṃ yasyāṃ sā / tādṛśī //MT_2,17.37//
GSP27motik_2u:1192: punaḥ kathaṃbhūtā / naśyajjihvena / na tu naṣṭajihvena / ucyamānā yā ugrakathā / tasyāḥ yaḥ arthaḥ / tasya yaḥ anubhavaḥ / tenopamā yatra tat / tādrśam / kā iva / anullikhitāni cittasthāni ca tāni citrakṛccittasthāni ca yāni citrāṇi / taiḥ vyāptā bhittibhūr iva //MT_2,17.38//
GSP27motik_2u:1194: parivismāryamāṇā / na tu vismāritā / yā acchā bhittirahitā / kalpanānagarī / tasyāḥ nibhā sadṛśī / sarvāsām ṛtumatīnām anutpannasya varasya mardaḥ mardanam / tadvat asphuṭā ākṛtiḥ yasyāḥ sā / nikaṭavartitvena buddhāv ārūḍhatvajñāpanārtham ṛtumatīnām ity uktam //MT_2,17.39//
GSP27motik_2u:1196: bhāvī puṣpākhyo varākāraḥ yasya saḥ / tādṛśo yaḥ vasantarasaḥ / tadvat rañjanā yasyāḥ sā / tatsadṛśīty arthaḥ / antarlīnaḥ taraṅgaughaḥ yasyāḥ sā antarlīnataraṅgaughā / tādṛśī cāsau saumyavārisarit saumyavāriyuktā nadī / tayā samā sadṛśī / etair viśeṣaṇaiś copaśāntiprakaraṇaśravaṇānantaraṃ buddhyārohamātrasvarūpā sṛṣṭis tiṣṭhatīti sūcitam //MT_2,17.40//
GSP27motik_2u:1197: nirvāṇākhyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tataḥ ṣaṣṭham udāhṛtam / śiṣṭo granthaḥ parīmāṇaṃ tasya jñeyaṃ mahārthadam //MU_2,17.41//
GSP27motik_2u:1198: tataḥ upaśāntiprakaraṇānantaraṃ / śiṣṭaḥ granthaḥ sārdhaṣoḍaśasahasrāṇi parīmāṇam //MT_2,17.41//
GSP27motik_2u:1200: buddhe tasmin bhavec chrotā nirvāṇaḥ śāntakalpanaḥ / acetyacitprakāśātmā vijñānātmā nirāmayaḥ //MU_2,17.42//
GSP27motik_2u:1201: nirvāṇaḥ brahmaṇi līnaḥ / vijñānātmā śuddhajñānasvarūpaḥ / nirāmayaḥ dṛśyākhyāmayarahitaḥ //MT_2,17.42//
GSP27motik_2u:1203: nirvāhitā avasānaṃ nītā jagadyātrā yena saḥ / tādṛśaḥ / kṛtaṃ samāptaṃ / kartavyaṃ yena kṛtakartavyaḥ / tādṛśaś cāsāv / ata eva susthitaś ca //MT_2,17.43//
GSP27motik_2u:1205: samastāḥ ye vitatārambhāḥ / teṣu vajrastambhaḥ avicala ity arthaḥ / nabhonibhaḥ śarīrayātrārthaṃ kṛtair api karmabhir aliptatvāt ākāśasadṛśaḥ / vinigīrṇaṃ citsvarūpe svātmani līnīkṛtaṃ / yat jagajjālaṃ / tenātitṛptimān nirapekṣa ity arthaḥ //MT_2,17.44//
GSP27motik_2u:1207: rūpam viṣayaḥ / ālokaḥ tadgrahaṇopāyaḥ / manaskṛtiḥ manaskāraḥ / ālokena gṛhītasya rūpasya manasi anusandhānam iti yāvat //MT_2,17.45//
GSP27motik_2u:1208: sadeha eva nirdehaḥ sasaṃsāro 'py asaṃsṛtiḥ / cinmayo //hanapāṣāṇajaṭharajaṭharopamaḥ //MU_2,17.46//
GSP27motik_2u:1209: sadehaḥ sattvaśeṣaṃ tāvat śarīrasya sthitatvāt / nirdehaḥ śarīre 'bhimānābhāvāt / cinmayaḥ citsvarūpa aham iti niścayāt / ghanapāṣāṇasya yat jaṭharam / tasya yat jaṭharam / tenopamā yasya saḥ / tādṛśaḥ acetyacinmayatvāt //MT_2,17.46//
GSP27motik_2u:1210: cidādityas tapaṃl loke 'py andhakārodaropamaḥ / paraprakāśarūpo 'pi param āndhyam ivāgataḥ //MU_2,17.47//
GSP27motik_2u:1211: cidādityaḥ cidādityasvarūpaḥ / ata eva loke tapann api / na hi citsparśarahitaḥ kaścit bhāvaḥ saṃbhavati / sattve 'pi tasya asaṃkalpatvaprasaṅgāt / andhakārodaropamaḥ andhakārasya yat udaraṃ / tenopamā yasya / tādṛśaḥ padārthavibhāgarahitatvāt / na hi andhakārodare padārthavibhāgaḥ bhavati / paraprakāśarūpo 'pi uttīrṇacitprakāśarūpo 'pi / param āndhyam āgataḥ iva na kiṃciddraṣṭṛtvāt //MT_2,17.47//
GSP27motik_2u:1214: kasmiṃścid romakoṭyagre tasyeyam avatiṣṭhate / jagallakṣmīr mahāmeroḥ puṣpe kvacid ivālinī //MU_2,17.49//
GSP27motik_2u:1215: kaśmiṃscit atisūkṣmatayā vaktum aśakye svapnavad iti śeṣaḥ / svapne hi puruṣasya kasmiṃścid aṃśe svapnajagad avatiṣṭhate //MT_2,17.49//
GSP27motik_2u:1216: paramāṇau paramāṇau cidākāśasya koṭare / jagallakṣmīsahasrāṇi dhatte kṛtvā ca paśyati //MU_2,17.50//
GSP27motik_2u:1217: cidākāśasya svarūpabhūtasya cinmātrākāśasya / koṭare madhye sthite / paramāṇau paramāṇau jagallakṣmīsahasrāṇi kṛtvā dhatte dhārayati / na kevalaṃ dhatte / kiṃ tu sākṣitayā sthitatvāt paśyati ca //MT_2,17.50//
GSP27motik_2u:1218: nanu katham asau jagallakṣmīsahasrāṇy antarvartayatīty / atra sargāntaślokenāha
GSP27motik_2u:1220: tulanam eti na muktimato bata pravitatāsti na nūnam avastunaḥ //MU_2,17.51//
GSP27motik_2u:1221: bata niścaye / he mahāmate / muktimataḥ nirvāṇaprakaraṇaśravaṇadvāreṇa muktiyuktasya puruṣasya / hṛdayasya pravitataḥ bhāvapradhāno nirdeśaḥ / tena hṛdayasya pravitateti arthaḥ / sā hariharābjajalakṣaśatair api tulanaṃ māpanaviṣayatāṃ na eti / yataḥ avastunaḥ avastubhūtasya hariharābjādirūpasya bhāvavṛndasya pravitatā / nūnaṃ niścaye / nāsti / na cāvastunā vastumāpanaṃ yuktaṃ / tathā ca noktadeśaprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ / iti śivam //MT_2,17.51//
GSP27motik_2u:1222: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe saptadaśaḥ sargaḥ // 2,17 //
GSP27motik_2u:1223: oṃ śrotṛpravṛttyarthaṃ svena kriyamāṇasya granthasyānyavilakṣaṇatvena samyagjñānaṃ prati paropāyatvaṃ kathayati
GSP27motik_2u:1224: asyāṃ vācitamātrāyāṃ paro bodhaḥ pravartate / bījād iva yato vyuptād avaśyaṃbhāvi satphalam //MU_2,18.1//
GSP27motik_2u:1225: asyāṃ mokṣopāyābhidhāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ / bodhaḥ kaḥ / yataḥ yasmāt bodhāt / satphalaṃ mokṣākhyaṃ śubhaṃ phalam / avaśyaṃbhāvi bhavati / kasmād iva / vyuptād bījād iva //MT_2,18.1//
GSP27motik_2u:1226: nanu mahāmunipraṇītāni śāstrāntarāṇi tyaktvā kim iti idam eva śāstraṃ gṛhṇāmīty / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:1227: api pauruṣam ādeyaṃ śāstraṃ ced yuktibodhakam / anyat tv ārṣam api tyājyaṃ bhāvyaṃ nyāyaikasevinā //MU_2,18.2//
GSP27motik_2u:1228: pauruṣam puruṣanirmitam / ādeyaṃ grahītavyaṃ / yuktibodhakam sattarkabodhakam / anyat yuktyabodhakam / ārṣam ṛṣinirmitam / atra ca pratibhānvitaiḥ kaścid abhiprāyo boddhavyaḥ yo 'smābhiḥ ārambha eva pratibhāvatāṃ svayaṃ jñeyatvena tadrahitānām akathanīyatvena coktaḥ //MT_2,18.2//
GSP27motik_2u:1229: yuktiyuktam upādeyaṃ vacanaṃ bālakād api / anyat tṛṇam iva tyājyam apy uktaṃ padmajanmanā //MU_2,18.3//
GSP27motik_2u:1230: atrāpi pratibhāvadbhiḥ ārambhe svayaṃ jñeyatvenokto 'rthaḥ svayaṃ boddhavyaḥ / na ca tadbodhenāsmiñ śāstre anādaraḥ kāryaḥ pratibhāvattvahāneḥ / evam uttaratrāpi yatra tatra svayam abhyūhyam //MT_2,18.3//
GSP27motik_2u:1231: punar apy etad eva bhaṅgyantareṇa kathayati
GSP27motik_2u:1232: yo 'mbhas tātasya kūpo 'yam iti kaupaṃ pibet kaṭu / tyaktvā gāṅgaṃ puraḥsthaṃ taṃ ko 'nuśāsati rāgiṇam //MU_2,18.4//
GSP27motik_2u:1233: yaḥ puruṣaḥ / puraḥsthaṃ gāṅgaṃ toyaṃ tyaktvā / ayaṃ kūpaḥ tātasya nijasya pituḥ bhavati / iti etadarthaṃ / kaupaṃ kūpasambandhi / kaṭu ambhaḥ pibet / tam anurāgiṇaṃ pitṛviṣayarāgākhyadoṣayuktaṃ / kaḥ anuśāsati upadiśati / nāsāv upadeśārhaḥ iti bhāvaḥ / ayam atrābhiprāyaḥ / yaḥ puruṣaḥ / sadyuktiyuktam api pauruṣaṃ vacanaṃ / pauruṣeyam idam iti tyajati / tadrahitam api ārṣaṃ vacanaṃ / ārṣam ity etāvanmātreṇa gṛhṇāti / tasyopadeśo na kāryaḥ iti //MT_2,18.4//
GSP27motik_2u:1235: yathoṣasi pravṛttāyām āloko 'vaśyam eṣyati / asyāṃ vācitamātrāyāṃ svavivekas tathaiṣyati //MU_2,18.5//
GSP27motik_2u:1237: śrutāyāṃ prājñavadanād buddhāyāṃ svayam eva vā / śanaiḥ śanair vicāreṇa buddhau saṃskāra āgate //MU_2,18.6//
GSP27motik_2u:1238: pūrvaṃ tāvad udety antar bhṛśaṃ saṃskṛtavākyatā / śuddhā muktā latevoccair yā sabhāsthānabhūṣaṇam //MU_2,18.7//
GSP27motik_2u:1240: nanu viraktasya mama kiṃ saṃskṛtavākyatayā prayojanam ity / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:1241: parā virāgatodeti mahattvaguṇaśālinī / sā yayā sneham āyānti rājāno 'jagarā api //MU_2,18.8//
GSP27motik_2u:1242: virakteṣu hi ajagaratulyāḥ rājāno 'pi sneham āyānti //MT_2,18.8//
GSP27motik_2u:1243: pūrvāparajñaḥ sarvatra naro bhavati buddhimān / padārthānāṃ yathā dīpahasto niśi sulocanaḥ //MU_2,18.9//
GSP27motik_2u:1245: lobhamohādayo doṣās tānavaṃ yānty alaṃ śanaiḥ / dhiyo diśaḥ samāsannaśarado mihikā yathā //MU_2,18.10//
GSP27motik_2u:1246: lobhamohādayaḥ kāḥ / yathā mihikāḥ samāsannaśaradaḥ pratyāsannaśaratkālāyāḥ diśaḥ tānavaṃ yānti / tathety arthaḥ //MT_2,18.10//
GSP27motik_2u:1247: kevalaṃ samapekṣante vivekābhyasanaṃ dhiyaḥ / na kācana phalaṃ dhatte svabhyāsena vinā kriyā //MU_2,18.11//
GSP27motik_2u:1248: nanu kimarthaṃ vivekābhyāsam apekṣante ity / atrāha / na kācaneti //MT_2,18.11//
GSP27motik_2u:1249: manaḥ prasādam āyāti śaradīva mahat saraḥ / paraṃ sāmyam upādhatte nirmandara ivārṇavaḥ //MU_2,18.12//
GSP27motik_2u:1250: prasādaṃ rāgādimalarahitatvāt nairmalyam / param niratiśayam / sāmyaṃ samatākhyaṃ guṇam / upādhatte dhārayati / atrāpi manasa eva kartṛtvam //MT_2,18.12//
GSP27motik_2u:1251: nirastakālimā vajraśikhevāstatamaḥpaṭā / parijvalaty alaṃ prajñā padārthapravibhāginī //MU_2,18.13//
GSP27motik_2u:1252: nirastaḥ dūre gataḥ / kālimā kāluṣaṃ / yasyāḥ sā //MT_2,18.13//
GSP27motik_2u:1253: dainyadāridryadoṣādyā dṛṣṭayo darśitāntarāḥ / na nikṛntanti marmāṇi sasaṃnāham iveṣavaḥ //MU_2,18.14//
GSP27motik_2u:1254: darśitaṃ vivecitaṃ / antaram sārākhyaḥ āntaraḥ bhāgaḥ yāsāṃ tāḥ / niḥsāratvena jñātā ity arthaḥ //MT_2,18.14//
GSP27motik_2u:1255: hṛdayaṃ nāvalumpanti bhīmāḥ saṃsṛtibhītayaḥ / puraḥsthitam api prājñaṃ mahopalam ivākhavaḥ //MU_2,18.15//
GSP27motik_2u:1256: hṛdayaṃ kathaṃbhūtam api / puraḥsthitam api agre sthitam api / punaḥ kathaṃbhūtam / prājñam //MT_2,18.15//
GSP27motik_2u:1257: kathaṃ syād āditā janmakarmaṇor daivapuṃstvayoḥ / ityādisaṃśayagaṇaḥ śāmyaty ahni yathā tamaḥ //MU_2,18.16//
GSP27motik_2u:1259: sarvathā sarvabhāveṣu saṃgatir upaśāmyati / yāminyām iva yātāyāṃ prajñāloka upāgate //MU_2,18.17//
GSP27motik_2u:1260: sarvabhāveṣu tyāgādānārheṣu samasteṣu padārtheṣu / sarvathā saṃgatiḥ tyāgādānārūpā sambandhaḥ upaśāmyati / kasmin sati / pratijñāloka upāgate sati / kadeva / yāminyāṃ rātrau yātāyām iva satyām / upekṣā eva sarvatrāyātīti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,18.17//
GSP27motik_2u:1261: samudrasyeva gāmbhīryaṃ sthairyaṃ meror iva sthitam / antaḥśītalatā cendor ivodeti vicāriṇaḥ //MU_2,18.18//
GSP27motik_2u:1263: sā jīvanmuktatā tasya śanaiḥ pariṇatiṃ gatā / śāntāśeṣavikalpasya bhavaty āviśya yoginaḥ //MU_2,18.19//
GSP27motik_2u:1265: sarvārthaśītalā śuddhā paramālokadā sudhīḥ / paraṃ prakāśam āyāti jyotsneva sakalaindavī //MU_2,18.20//
GSP27motik_2u:1266: sarvārtheṣu bhāvābhāvayukteṣu samasteṣu padārtheṣu / śītalā harṣāmarṣākhyatāparahitā / śuddhā rāgādirahitā / paramālokaṃ cinmātrālokaṃ dadhātīti tādṛśī / śobhanā cāsau dhīḥ sudhīḥ / aindavī indusambandhinī //MT_2,18.20//
GSP27motik_2u:1269: śama eva ālokaḥ asyāstīti tādṛśe / kaleḥ kalahasya kṣobhasya / ketavaḥ cihnabhūtāḥ rāgādayo doṣāḥ / sūryodaye ca ketavaḥ dhūmaketavaḥ nodyanti //MT_2,18.21//
GSP27motik_2u:1270: śāmyanti śuddhim āyānti saumyās tiṣṭhanti sūnnate / acañcalajaḍās tṛṣṇāḥ śaradīvābhramālikāḥ //MU_2,18.22//
GSP27motik_2u:1272: yatkiṃcanakarī krūrā grāmyatā vinivartate / dīnānanā piśācānāṃ līleva divasāgame //MU_2,18.23//
GSP27motik_2u:1273: yatkiṃcanakarī ayuktakāriṇī / grāmyatayā hi puruṣaḥ yatkiṃcid eva karoti //MT_2,18.23//
GSP27motik_2u:1274: dharmabhittau bhṛśaṃ lagnāṃ dhiyaṃ dhairyadhuraṃ gatām / ādhayo na vilumpanti vātāś citralatām iva //MU_2,18.24//
GSP27motik_2u:1275: dharma eva bhittiḥ / tasyāṃ lagnāṃ / ata eva dhairyadhuraṃ gatām dhairyayuktām iti yāvat / dharmayukto hi dhīro bhavati / citrarūpā latā citralatā / tām //MT_2,18.24//
GSP27motik_2u:1276: na pataty avaṭe jantur viṣayāsaṅgarūpiṇi / kaḥ kila jñātasaraṇiḥ śvabhre samanudhāvati //MU_2,18.25//
GSP27motik_2u:1277: viṣayāsaṅgarūpiṇi bhogāsaktirūpe / etad eva uttarārdhena samarthayati / kaḥ kileti //MT_2,18.25//
GSP27motik_2u:1278: sacchāstrasādhuvṛttānām avirodhini karmaṇi / ramate dhīr yathāprāpte sādhvīvāntaḥpurājire //MU_2,18.26//
GSP27motik_2u:1279: sacchāstreṇa mokṣopāyākhyasacchāstrāvagāhanena sādhuvṛttaṃ caritaṃ yeṣāṃ te / tādṛśānāṃ / yathāprāpte pravāhāgate / na tu yatnād ṛte //MT_2,18.26//
GSP27motik_2u:1280: jagatāṃ koṭilakṣyeṣu yāvantaḥ paramāṇavaḥ / teṣām ekaikaśo 'ntaḥsthān sargān paśyaty asargadhīḥ //MU_2,18.27//
GSP27motik_2u:1281: asargā dhīḥ yasya saḥ / āścaryaṃ cāsargadhiyaḥ paramāṇau paramāṇau sargadarśanam / sargabījabhūtacinmātravyāptijñānena paramāṇau paramāṇau sargadarśanaṃ jñeyam //MT_2,18.27//

GSP27motik_2u:1389: dṛṣṭāntabuddhād ekātmajñānaśāstrārthavedanāt / mahāvākyārthasaṃvittyā śāntir nirvāṇam ucyate //MU_2,19.2//
GSP27motik_2u:1390: ekam kevalam / ātmajñānaṃ pratipādyatvena yasmin / tādṛśaṃ yat śāstraṃ / tasya yo 'rthaḥ / tasya vedanāt vicārāt / utpannayā mahāvākyārthasaṃvittyā / garbhīkṛtāvāntaravākyamahāvākyārthaparicchedena / siddhā śāntiḥ manaḥkṣobharāhityaṃ / paṇḍitaiḥ nirvāṇam ucyate / vedanāt kathaṃbhūtāt / dṛṣṭāntaiḥ buddhāt jñātāt siddhād iti yāvat //MT_2,19.2//
GSP27motik_2u:1392: tasmād dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntavikalpollasitair alam / yayā kayācid yuktyāśu mahāvākyārtham āśrayet //MU_2,19.3//
GSP27motik_2u:1393: alam kṛtam / naitaiḥ prayojanam ity arthaḥ //MT_2,19.3//
GSP27motik_2u:1394: śāntiḥ śreyaḥ paraṃ viddhi tatprāptau yatnavān bhavet / bhoktavya odanaḥ prāptaḥ kiṃ tatsiddhivikalpitaiḥ //MU_2,19.4//
GSP27motik_2u:1395: śāntiḥ manovikalparūpakṣobharāhityam / siddhivikalpitaiḥ katham etat sampannam iti vikalpaiḥ //MT_2,19.4//
GSP27motik_2u:1396: akāraṇaṃ kāraṇibhir bodhārtham upamīyate / upamānais tūpameyasadṛśair ekadeśataḥ //MU_2,19.5//
GSP27motik_2u:1400: dṛṣṭāntair yuktibhir yatnād vāñchitaṃ tyajatetarat / vicāraṇavatā bhāvyaṃ śāntiśāstrārthaśālinā //MU_2,19.7//
GSP27motik_2u:1401: vāñchitaṃ abhilaṣitam / itarat vicāravyatiriktam / śāntiś ca śāstrārthaś ca tābhyāṃ śālate iti tādṛśena //MT_2,19.7//
GSP27motik_2u:1403: tāvad vicārayet prājño yāvad viśrāntim ātmani / samprayāty apunarnāśāṃ śāntiṃ turyapadābhidhām //MU_2,19.9//
GSP27motik_2u:1404: śāstraṃ ca upaśamaś ca saujanyaṃ ca prajñā ca tajjñasamāgamaś ca / taiḥ upalakṣitaḥ / antarāntare madhye madhye sampannāḥ / dharmyānāṃ dharmād anapetānāṃ arthānām upārjanam / tasya kriyāḥ yasya saḥ / tādṛśaḥ prājñaḥ tāvat vicārayet / yāvat apunarnāśāṃ pradhvaṃsābhāvarahitāṃ / turyapadābhidhāṃ turyapadeti nāmadheyām / ātmani viśrāntiṃ ātmaviśrāntilakṣaṇāṃ śāntim / samprayāti //MT_2,19.8-9//
GSP27motik_2u:1405: nanv ātmani viśrāntyā kiṃ setsyatīty / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:1406: turyaviśrāntiyuktasya pratīrṇasya bhavārṇavāt / jīvato 'jīvataś caiva gṛhasthasyātha vā yateḥ //MU_2,19.10//
GSP27motik_2u:1407: na kṛtenākṛtenārtho na śrutismṛtivibhramaiḥ / nirmandara ivāṃbhodhiḥ sa tiṣṭhati yathāsthitam //MU_2,19.11//
GSP27motik_2u:1408: jīvataḥ jīvanmuktasyājīvataḥ videhamuktasya / arthaḥ prayojanam / nanu katham asau tiṣṭhatīty / atrāha / nirmandara iti / saḥ viśrāntiyuktaḥ //MT_2,19.10-11//
GSP27motik_2u:1409: ekāṃśenopamānānām upameyasadharmatā / boddhavyā bodhyabodhāya na stheyaṃ codyacañcunā //MU_2,19.12//
GSP27motik_2u:1410: codyena cañcuḥ vittaḥ / prasiddha iti yāvat / iti codyacañcuḥ codyaśīlenety arthaḥ //MT_2,19.12//
GSP27motik_2u:1411: yayā kayācid yuktyāśu boddhavyaṃ bodhyam eva te / muktaye tan na paśyanti vyākulāś codyacañcavaḥ //MU_2,19.13//
GSP27motik_2u:1412: te iti kartari ṣaṣṭhī / tvām iti śeṣaḥ / vyākulāḥ codyacañcavaḥ / tat tadā / tvām na paśyanti / kim utādhigacchantīti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,19.13//
GSP27motik_2u:1414: hṛdaye saṃvidākāśe viśrānte 'nubhavātmani / vastuny anarthaṃ yaḥ praṣṭā codyacañcuḥ sa ucyate //MU_2,19.14//
GSP27motik_2u:1415: hṛdaye manasi / viśrānte 'pi anubhavātmani saṃvidākāśe cidākāśe / vastuni yaḥ anartham saṃśayarūpam anartham / praṣṭā pṛcchakaḥ bhavati / paṇḍitaiḥ saḥ codyacañcuḥ ucyate / svānubhavāviṣṭe 'pi vastuni yaḥ punaḥ punaḥ codyān utpādayati saḥ codyacañcur iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,19.14//
GSP27motik_2u:1416: abhimānavikalpāṃśair ajño jñaptiṃ vikalpayan / bodhaṃ malinayaty antar mukhaṃ sarpa ivāmalam //MU_2,19.15//
GSP27motik_2u:1417: abhimānenāhaṃ samyak codanaśīla ity abhimānena kṛtaiḥ vikalpāṃśaiḥ / codyarūpaiḥ vikalpāṃśaiḥ / antaḥ svasmin / ajñaḥ svām jñaptiṃ buddhiṃ / vikalpayan vikalpayuktāṃ kurvan / bodhaṃ malinayati bhedamālinyadūṣitaṃ karoti / ataḥ tvayā vyarhāḥ vikalpāḥ / na kāryā iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,19.15//
GSP27motik_2u:1419: sarvapramāṇasattānāṃ padam abdhir apām iva / pramāṇam ekam eveha pratyakṣaṃ rāma tac chṛṇu //MU_2,19.16//
GSP27motik_2u:1420: sarvāsām anumānādibhedabhinnānām samastānāṃ pramāṇasattānāṃ / abdhir ivāpāṃ sthānaṃ āśrayaṃ / ekam pratyakṣam eva iha loke pramāṇam asti / na hi anumānādayaḥ pratyakṣaṃ vinā sthātuṃ śaknuvanti / he rāma / tvam tat pratyakṣaṃ nāma pramāṇaṃ / śṛṇu //MT_2,19.16//
GSP27motik_2u:1422: sarvārthasāram adhyakṣaṃ vedanaṃ vidur uttamāḥ / nūnaṃ tat prati yat siddhaṃ tat pratyakṣam udāhṛtam //MU_2,19.17//
GSP27motik_2u:1423: uttamāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ / sarvārthānāṃ sāraprakāśanadvāreṇa siddhipradatvāt sārabhūtaṃ vedanaṃ jñānam eva / adhyakṣaṃ viduḥ sārabhūtavastuvācakatvād adhyakṣaśabdasya / he rāma / nūnaṃ niścaye / tat prati vedanarūpaṃ adhyakṣaṃ prati / yat siddhaṃ bhavati / paṇḍitaiḥ tad vastu pratyakṣam udāhṛtam / akṣaṃ prati siddhaṃ pratyakṣam iti vyutpatteḥ / akṣaśabdasya ca bhāmetivad adhyakṣavācakatvam //MT_2,19.17//
GSP27motik_2u:1425: anubhūter vedanasya pratipatter yathāsthitam / pratyakṣam iti nāmeha kṛtaṃ jīvaḥ sa eva ca //MU_2,19.18//
GSP27motik_2u:1426: ataḥ paṇḍitaiḥ / anubhūteḥ anubhūtirūpasya / pratipatteḥ pratipattirūpasya / vedanasya / iha loke / yathāsthitam na tv anyathā saṃbhāvitaṃ / pratyakṣam iti nāma kṛtam / vedanasyaiva vedanaṃ prati siddhatvād anyasya sarvasya tasmiṃl layāsādanāt sa eva jīvaḥ bhavati / vedanād anyasya śarīrādeḥ pāṣāṇatulyatvena jīvatvāyogāt anubhūtipratipattyoḥ sphuṭatvāsphuṭatvakṛto bhedo jñeyaḥ //MT_2,19.18//
GSP27motik_2u:1428: sa eva saṃvit sa punar ahaṃtāpratyayātmakaḥ / sa yayodeti saṃvittyā sā padārtha iti smṛtā //MU_2,19.19//
GSP27motik_2u:1429: sa eva jīva eva / ārohāvasthāyāṃ saṃvit bhavati / sa evāvarohāvasthāyāṃ ahaṃtāpratyayātmakaḥ bhavati / saḥ ahaṃtāpratyayātmakaḥ jīvaḥ / yayā saṃvittyā yena ghaṭādisaṃvedanena rūpeṇa / udeti sphurati / sā saṃvittiḥ / paṇḍitaiḥ padārtha iti smṛtā / na hi padārthasya saṃvittivyatirekeṇa pṛthaksvarūpam asti / sattve 'py asan kalpatvāt / na hi saṃvittiṃ vinā sat sat bhavati //MT_2,19.19//
GSP27motik_2u:1431: sa saṃkalpavikalpādyaiḥ kṛtanānākramo bhramaiḥ / jagattayā sphuraty ambu taraṅgāditayā yathā //MU_2,19.20//
GSP27motik_2u:1432: saḥ padārthaḥ / saṃkalpavikalpādyaiḥ saṃkalpavikalpaprabhṛtibhiḥ pramātṛniṣṭaiḥ viparyayajñānaiḥ / kṛtanānākramaḥ san / jagattayā sphurati / kiṃ yathā / ambu yathā / yathā tat taraṅgāditayā sphurati tathety arthaḥ //MT_2,19.20//
GSP27motik_2u:1433: nanu śuddhasya vedanasya katham evaṃrūpatā sampannety / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:1434: prāg akāraṇam evāśu sargādau sargalīlayā / sphuritvā kāraṇībhūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ svayam ātmani //MU_2,19.21//
GSP27motik_2u:1435: pratyakṣaṃ vedanarūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ / prāk sargāt prāk / akāraṇam eva sat / sargādau sargonmukhatāsamaye / sargalīlayā sphuritvā / ātmani sargarūpe svātmani / svayaṃ svātantryeṇa / kāraṇībhūtam / na ca svātantryakṛte katham iti paryanuyogaḥ yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,19.21//
GSP27motik_2u:1436: nanu vedanarūpasya jīvasya kāraṇatvaṃ kiṃrūpam astīty / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:1437: kāraṇatvaṃ vicāro 'sya jīvasyāsad api sthitaṃ / sad ivāsyāṃ jagadrūpasampattau vyaktim āgatam //MU_2,19.22//
GSP27motik_2u:1438: jagadrūpasampattau vicāraḥ vimarśaḥ / asya śuddhavedanarūpasya jīvasya / vā kāraṇatvaṃ bhavati / kathambhūtaṃ kāranatvaṃ / asad api paramārthataḥ asatsvarūpam api / sad iva sthitam / punaḥ kathambhūtaṃ / abhivyaktiṃ prākaṭyaṃ gatam //MT_2,19.22//
GSP27motik_2u:1439: nanu punar api kiṃ tasya jīvasya kāraṇatvaṃ naśyaty atha vā nety / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:1440: svayam eva vicāras tu sanañarthaṃ svakaṃ vapuḥ / nāśayitvā karoty āśu pratyakṣaṃ paramaṃ padam //MU_2,19.23//
GSP27motik_2u:1441: svayam eva vicāraḥ sanañarthaṃ svābhāvayuktaṃ / svakaṃ vapuḥ nijavicārākhyaṃ svarūpaṃ nāśayitvā / paramaṃ padaṃ kāraṇatvānavacchinnaṃ svasvarūpaṃ / pratyakṣaṃ karoti / vicāravaśād eva / punar api jīvasya kāraṇatvaṃ naśyatīti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,19.23//
GSP27motik_2u:1442: nanu vicāraḥ kathaṃ paramaṃ padaṃ pratyakṣīkarotīty apekṣāyām āha
GSP27motik_2u:1443: vicārayan vicāro 'pi nātmānam adhigacchati / yadā tadā nirullekhaṃ param evāvaśiṣyate //MU_2,19.24//
GSP27motik_2u:1444: vicāraḥ vimarśaḥ / ātmānaṃ vicārayan kiṃrūpo 'ham iti vimarśaviṣayīkurvan / yadā ātmānaṃ nādhigacchati na kiṃcidrūpatvāt na labhate / tadā nirullekhaṃ vimarśarahitaṃ / paraṃ padaṃ śuddhacinmātrākhyaśreṣṭhaṃ svarūpam / evāvatiṣṭhate vicāraṇīyābhāvād ity arthaḥ //MT_2,19.24//
GSP27motik_2u:1445: nanu puruṣa etasyām avasthāyāṃ buddhīndriyakarmāṇi karoti na vety / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:1446: manasy anīhite śānte tair buddhīndriyakarmabhiḥ / neha kaiścit kṛtair artho nākṛtair apy abhāvanāt //MU_2,19.25//
GSP27motik_2u:1447: manasi vicārasvarūpe manasi / anīhite svakriyām akurvati / ata eva śānte sati / puruṣasya taiḥ prasiddhaiḥ / kaiścid buddhīndriyakarmabhiḥ kṛtaiḥ / arthaḥ na bhavati / akṛtaiś cārthaḥ na bhavati / kutaḥ / abhāvanāt bhāvanārāhityāt / nairapekṣyād iti yāvat //MT_2,19.25//
GSP27motik_2u:1448: nanu tadā karmendriyāṇāṃ kā vārtety / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:1449: manasy anīhite śānte na pravartanta eva te / karmendriyāṇi karmādāv asaṃcāritayantravat //MU_2,19.26//
GSP27motik_2u:1450: karmendriyāṇāṃ tasyām avasthāyāṃ pravartanam eva nāsti / kā vārtā tatkarmaṇāṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ / etādṛśī cāvasthā jīvanmuktānāṃ durlabhaiva / na hi sarvadā te atraiva tiṣṭhanti / videhamuktās tu sarvadā etanmayā evety alaṃ bahunā //MT_2,19.26//
GSP27motik_2u:1452: manoyantrasya calane kāraṇaṃ vedanaṃ viduḥ / prāṇālī dārumeṣasya rajjur antargatā yathā //MU_2,19.27//
GSP27motik_2u:1453: paṇḍitāḥ manomantrasya calane vedanam eva kāraṇaṃ viduḥ / vedanānantaram eva hi manaḥ calati / prāṇālī asya manasaḥ antargatā rajjuḥ bhavati / kasya / yasya dārumeṣasya yathā / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / manaḥ dārumeṣatulyam / prāṇālī rajjutulyā / vedanam rajjugrāhakatulyam / iti vedanasyaiva manaḥpravṛttau kāraṇatvāt / yuktā tacchāntau tacchāntir iti //MT_2,19.27//
GSP27motik_2u:1454: nanu bhavatu vedanaśāntyā manaḥśāntiḥ / vedanakṣobhena manasaḥ kṣobhe sati jagat kuto niryātīty / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:1455: rūpālokamanaskārapadārthādyākulaṃ jagat / vidyate vedanasyāntar vāte 'ntaḥ spandanaṃ yathā //MU_2,19.28//
GSP27motik_2u:1456: padārthāḥ rūpādhārabhūtāni dravyāṇi / ato vedanād eva rūpādirūpam jagan niryātīti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,19.28//
GSP27motik_2u:1457: nanu svabhāvataḥ śuddhasya vedanasyāntaḥ katham etad astīty / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:1458: sarvātmavedanaṃ śuddhaṃ yathodeti tadātmakam / bhāti prasṛtadikkālabāhyāntārūpadehakam //MU_2,19.29//
GSP27motik_2u:1459: śuddham kenāpi rūpeṇāpariniṣṭhitam / ata eva sarvātmavedanam yathodeti tadātmakaṃ bhāti sphurati / na tu tanmadhye malam iva jagad astīti bhāvaḥ / kathambhūtaṃ vedanaṃ / dik kālaś ca bāhyaṃ cāntaś ca / tat digādi / prasṛtaḥ vistāraṃ gataḥ / digādirūpaḥ dehaḥ svarūpaṃ yasya / tat prasṛtadikkālabāhyāntārūpadehakam //MT_2,19.29//
GSP27motik_2u:1460: punaḥ punaḥ ślokāntareṇa tad eva pratipādayati
GSP27motik_2u:1461: draṣṭaiva dṛśyatābhāsaṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ dhārayan sthitaḥ / svaṃ yathā tatra yad rūpaṃ pratibhāti tathaiva tat //MU_2,19.30//
GSP27motik_2u:1462: draṣṭā eva vedanasvarūpaḥ draṣṭā eva / dṛśyatayā bhāsate / iti tādṛśaṃ svarūpaṃ dhārayan sthitaḥ bhavati / tatra sati tasyeti śeṣaḥ / tasya draṣṭuḥ svaṃ rūpaṃ yathā bhāti sphurati / tat svaṃ rūpaṃ / tathaiva bhavati / nānyathā svapnavad iti śeṣaḥ //MT_2,19.30//
GSP27motik_2u:1463: sarvam ātmā yathā yatra saṃkalpatvam ivāgataḥ / tiṣṭhaty āśu tathā tatra tadrūpa iva rājate //MU_2,19.31//
GSP27motik_2u:1464: sarvam ātmā bhavati / ataḥ sa ātmā yatra yathā tiṣṭhati tatra tathā tadrūpa iva rājate / paramārthatas tu na rājate / svarūpe tathaiva sthitatvād itīvaśabdopādānam / ātmā kathambhūta iva / saṃkalpatvaṃ saṃkalpabhāvaṃ / gata ivānyathā nānārūpatvam asya na yujyeteti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,19.31//
GSP27motik_2u:1465: sarvātmakatayā draṣṭur dṛśyatvam iva yujyate / draṣṭṛtvaṃ draṣṭṛsadbhāve dṛśyasya tv asti nāsataḥ //MU_2,19.32//
GSP27motik_2u:1466: draṣṭuḥ sarvātmakatayā śuddhatayā sthitena sarvabhāvena / dṛśyatvaṃ yujyata iva / paramārthatas tu na yujyate draṣṭṛtvād apracyuter itīvaśabdopādānaṃ / asataḥ svarūpeṇāsataḥ / dṛśyasya draṣṭṛtvaṃ nāsti / draṣṭṛtayā sambhāvite svasmin svāpekṣatvenātmāśrayāpatteḥ //MT_2,19.32//
GSP27motik_2u:1468: akāraṇakam evāto brahmakalpam idaṃ sthitam / pratyakṣam eva nirmātṛ tasyāṃśās tv anupādhayaḥ //MU_2,19.33//
GSP27motik_2u:1469: ataḥ akāraṇakam paramārthataḥ śuddhasya brahmaṇaḥ akartṛkatvāt kāraṇarahitam / idaṃ jagat / brahmakalpam brahmasadṛśaṃ / sthitaṃ bhavati / kathambhūtam jagat / pratyakṣam eva sphuṭam eva / nirmātṛ pramātṛrahitam śuddhasya brahmaṇo mātṛtāyogād / anyathā aśuddhatāpatteḥ / nanu mā bhavatu brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇatvaṃ mātṛtvaṃ vā / tadaṃśānāṃ tu tad bhavatv ity / atrāha / tasyāṃśā iti / tu pakṣāntare / tasya brahmaṇaḥ / aṃśāḥ anupādhayaḥ kāraṇatvādirūpopādhirahitā bhavanti / anyathā taddvāreṇa tasyāpi sopādhitvaprasaṅgāt //MT_2,19.33//
GSP27motik_2u:1471: svayatnamātretararūpako yas tad daivaśabdārtham apāsya dūre /
GSP27motik_2u:1472: śūreṇa sādho padam uttamaṃ tat svapauruṣeṇaiva hi labhyate 'ntaḥ //MU_2,19.34//
GSP27motik_2u:1473: yaḥ svayatnamātrakāt itararūpakaḥ itararūpatvena kalpitaḥ / tad daivaśabdārthaṃ dūre apāsya / he sādho / śūreṇa tat uttamaṃ padaṃ antaḥ svapauruṣeṇa mānasikena pauruṣeṇa / labhyate //MT_2,19.34//
GSP27motik_2u:1476: yāvad viśuddhāṃ svayam eva buddhām anantarūpāṃ paratām upaiṣi //MU_2,19.35//
GSP27motik_2u:1477: tvam satyena sitena doṣarahitena / ācāryaparamparāṇāṃ matena matānusāreṇa / tāvat tāvatkālaṃ vicāraya / yāvat paratām uttīrṇacidrūpatām upaiṣi / paratām kathambhūtām / viśuddhām cetyākhyamalarahitām / punaḥ kathambhūtām / svayam evāvabuddhām anubuddhām / punaḥ kathambhūtām / anantarūpām aparicchinnasvarūpām / iti śivam //MT_2,19.35//
GSP27motik_2u:1478: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe ekonaviṃśaḥ sargaḥ // 2,19 //
GSP27motik_2u:1480: āryasaṃgamayuktyādau prajñāṃ vṛddhiṃ nayed balāt / tato mahāpuruṣatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ //MU_2,20.1//
GSP27motik_2u:1481: puruṣaḥ ādau āryasaṃgamayuktyā sādhusaṃgākhyenopāyena / buddhiṃ vṛddhiṃ vivekakṣamatvaṃ nayet / tataḥ buddhyāsādhitaiḥ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ mahāpuruṣatā bhavet //MT_2,20.1//
GSP27motik_2u:1482: nanu mahāpuruṣaguṇair vinā mahāpuruṣatā kathaṃ sidhyatīty apekṣāyāṃ tadguṇāharaṇam eva kartavyatvena kathayati
GSP27motik_2u:1483: yo yo yena guṇeneha puruṣaḥ pravirājate / śikṣeta taṃ tam evāśu tasmād buddhivivṛddhaye //MU_2,20.2//
GSP27motik_2u:1484: buddhyā vivṛddhayeti vā pāṭhaḥ / āryasaṃgamayuktyā vivṛddhayā buddhyā ity arthaḥ / anyathā buddhivṛddhyabhāve kathaṃ paraguṇagrahaṇasāmarthyaṃ syāt //MT_2,20.2//
GSP27motik_2u:1485: nanu tarhi guṇagrahaṇaṃ suṣamam eveti mahāpuruṣatāpi susādhyaiva syād / ity atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:1486: mahāpuruṣatā tv eṣā śamādiguṇaśālinī / samyagjñānaṃ vinā rāma siddhim eti na kasyacit //MU_2,20.3//
GSP27motik_2u:1487: ataḥ samyagjñānam evāryasaṃgamayuktyā prathamaṃ sādhyam iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,20.3//
GSP27motik_2u:1489: jñānāc chamādayo yānti vṛddhiṃ satpuruṣakramāt / ślāghanīyāḥ phalenāntar vṛṣṭer iva navāṅkurāḥ //MU_2,20.4//
GSP27motik_2u:1490: jñānāt kathambhūtāt / satpuruṣakramāt / na tv asatpuruṣakramāt / kramaḥ paripāṭī / ādiśabdena damādīnāṃ grahaṇam / vṛṣṭer iti pañcamī //MT_2,20.4//
GSP27motik_2u:1491: nanu śamādibhir api kiṃ syād ity apekṣāyām āha
GSP27motik_2u:1492: śamādibhyo guṇebhyaś ca vardhate jñānam uttamam / annātmakebhyo yajñebhyaḥ śālivṛṣṭir ivottamā //MU_2,20.5//
GSP27motik_2u:1495: guṇāḥ śamādayo jñānāc chamādibhyas tathā jñatā / parasparaṃ vivardhete ete 'bdasarasī yathā //MU_2,20.6//
GSP27motik_2u:1496: ataḥ jñānāc chamādayaḥ / śamādibhyo jñānaṃ / yathā abdebhyo meghebhyaḥ saraḥ / sarasaḥ meghā iti piṇḍārthaḥ //MT_2,20.6//
GSP27motik_2u:1498: jñānaṃ satpuruṣācārāj jñānāt satpuruṣakramaḥ / parasparaṃ gatau vṛddhiṃ jñānasatpuruṣakramau //MU_2,20.7//
GSP27motik_2u:1500: nanu jñānaśamayoḥ saṃpattau puruṣasya kena yatnenottamapadaprāptir bhavatīty / atra sadṛṣṭāntam uttaraṃ kathayati
GSP27motik_2u:1501: yathā kamalarakṣiṇyā gītyā vitatatārayā / khagotsādena sahito gītānandaḥ prasādhyate //MU_2,20.8//
GSP27motik_2u:1502: jñānasatpuruṣehābhyām akartrā kartṛrūpiṇā / tathā puṃsā niricchena samam āsādyate padam //MU_2,20.9//
GSP27motik_2u:1503: yathā kamalarakṣiṇyā gopikayā kartryā / vitatā cāsau tārā ceti tādṛśyā gītyā karaṇabhūtayā / khagānāṃ yaḥ utsādaḥ dhānyād apāsanaṃ / tena sahitaḥ gītānandaḥ prasādhyate / na hi tasyāḥ tatra yatno 'sti / gītimātreṇaiva gītānandakhagotsādayoḥ siddhatvāt / mṛgāṇāṃ hi ayaṃ svabhāva eṣa yat gītiṃ śrutvā bhakṣyam api tyajantīti / tathā kartrā nāhaṃ karteti niścayāt kartṛtvaleparahitena kartṛrūpiṇā kartṛvad bhāsamāneneti yāvat / puruṣeṇa kartrā / jñānasatpuruṣehābhyāṃ jñānaśamādibhyāṃ karaṇābhyāṃ / ayatnena yatnarahitam eva / padam śuddhacinmātrākhyam uttamaṃ padaṃ / samāsādyate prāpyate / jñānaṃ śamādikaṃ cety etanmātrakam evātropāyaḥ / nānyat kiṃcid iti bhāvaḥ / puruṣeṇa kathambhūtena / niricchena jñānaśamādipūrṇatayā padaprāptāv apīcchārahitena / anyathecchārūpasya kṣobhasya sthitatvāt pūrṇatā na syād iti bhāvaḥ //MT_2,20.8-9//
GSP27motik_2u:1505: sadācārakramaḥ prokto mayaiṣa raghunandana / tathopadiśyate samyag ayaṃ jñānakramo 'dhunā //MU_2,20.10//
GSP27motik_2u:1506: proktaḥ etadyuktasyaiva vakṣyamāṇe jñānakrame 'dhikāritvād iti bhāvaḥ / nanv adhunā kiṃ karoṣīty apekṣāyām āha / tathopadiśyata iti / tathā sadācārakramavat / jñānakramaḥ brahmopadiṣṭā svātmajñānaparipāṭī //MT_2,20.10//
GSP27motik_2u:1508: idaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ puruṣārthaphalapradam / tajjñād āptātmaśāstrārthāc chrotavyaṃ kila dhīmatā //MU_2,20.11//
GSP27motik_2u:1509: bāhyadṛṣṭīn saṃmukhīkartum iti āyuṣyam iti ca idaṃ mumukṣuvyavahārākhyaṃ prakaraṇam / puruṣārthaphalapradam mokṣadam / tajjñāt kathambhūtāt / āptaḥ samyaṅ niścitaḥ / ātmaśāstrāṇām adhyātmaśāstrāṇām / arthaḥ yena / tasmāt //MT_2,20.11//
GSP27motik_2u:1510: nanv etacchravaṇena kiṃ syād ity / atrāha
GSP27motik_2u:1511: śrutvā tu buddhinairmalyād balād yāsyasi satpadam / yathā katakasaṃśleṣāt prasādam avaśam payaḥ //MU_2,20.12//
GSP27motik_2u:1512: tvam etac chrutvā / siddhāt buddhinairmalyāt / balāt ayatnam eva / satpadaṃ yāsyasi / atrottarārdhena dṛṣṭāntam āha / yatheti / katakam jalaśuddhikārī dravyaviśeṣaḥ //MT_2,20.12//
GSP27motik_2u:1513: nanu katham etacchravaṇena puruṣaḥ satpadaṃ yātīty / atra sargāntaślokenottaraṃ kathayati
GSP27motik_2u:1514: viditavedyam idaṃ hi mano mune vivaśam eva hi yāti paraṃ padam / yad avabuddham akhaṇḍitam uttamaṃ tad avabodhadaśāṃ na jahāti hi //MU_2,20.13//
GSP27motik_2u:1515: he mune munikarmānvitatvāt munirūpaśrīrāma / hi yasmāt / viditavedyaṃ manaḥ vivaśam eva paraṃ padaṃ yāti / ato viditavedyatvakāriṇaḥ etacchāstraśravaṇāt satpadaprāptir yuktaiveti bhāvaḥ / nanu viditavedyam api manaḥ yadi kadācid viditavedyatāṃ jahāti tadā kiṃ kāryam / ity atrāha / yad iti / manasā yat uttamaṃ na tv adharaṃ bhogarūpaṃ vastu / avabuddhaṃ samyaṅ niścitam / tat manaḥ / tadavabodhadaśāṃ tasyottamasya vastunaḥ / yo 'vabodhaḥ tasya daśāṃ / hi niścayena / na jahāti / viditavedyo hi kadācid api viditavedyatāṃ na jahātīti tātparyam / iti śivaṃ śivaṃ śivam iti //MT_2,20.13//
GSP27motik_2u:1516: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe viṃśaḥ sargaḥ // 2,20 //
GSP27motik_2u:1524: iti śrīkāśmīramaṇḍalāntarvartyārādhyapādamahāmāheśvaravaiḍūryakaṇṭhātmajaśrīmadavatārakaṇṭhaputraśrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuvyavahāraprakaraṇaṃ samāptam / iti śivam //
